monsters.name: Abjurer

traits.name: Arcane Ward
traits.desc: The abjurer has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever the abjurer takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the abjurer takes any remaining damage. When the abjurer casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The abjurer is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The abjurer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, dancing lights, mending, message, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): alarm*, mage armor*, magic missile, shield*

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force

spells.6th level (1 slots): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability*

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

traits.name: Extra Damage
traits.desc: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage on every hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
monsters.languages: Auran, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge}
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra 18 (4d8) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monsters.name: Al'chaia
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Al'chaia makes two silver greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Silver Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), Al'chaia can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

spells: Al'chaia's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): jump, misty step, nondetection (self only), tongues

monsters.name: Alhoon

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The alhoon has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Chilling Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The alhoon magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The alhoon's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The alkilith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the alkilith is motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary slime or fungus.

traits.name: Foment Madness
traits.desc:
Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.
If the saving throw against Foment Madness fails by 5 or more, the creature is instead subjected to the confusion spell for 1 minute (no concentration required by the alkilith). While under the effect of that confusion, the creature is immune to Foment Madness.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The alkilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alkilith makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) acid damage.

monsters.name: Allip
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Whispers of Madness
actions.desc: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Howling Babble {@recharge}
actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3) psychic damage, and it is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

monsters.name: Ammalia Cassalanter

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: Ammalia is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, mending, message

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, mage armor, magic missile

monsters.name: Amnizu

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the amnizu's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The amnizu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The amnizu uses Poison Mind. It also makes two attacks: one with its whip and one with its Disruptive Touch.

actions.name: Taskmaster Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 33 (6d10) force damage.

actions.name: Disruptive Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 44 (8d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Poison Mind
actions.desc: The amnizu targets one or two creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and is blinded until the start of the amnizu's next turn.

actions.name: Forgetfulness {@recharge}
actions.desc: The amnizu targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. That creature must make a 18 Intelligence saving throw and on a failure the target is stunned for 1 minute. A stunned creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target remains stunned for the full minute, it forgets everything it sensed, experienced, and learned during the last 5 hours.

reactions.name: Instinctive Charm
reactions.desc: When a creature within 60 feet of the amnizu makes an attack roll against it, and another creature is within the attack's range, the attacker must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker must target the creature that is closest to it, not including the amnizu or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target. If the saving throw is successful, the attacker is immune to the amnizu's Instinctive Charm for 24 hours.

spells: The amnizu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). The amnizu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): dominate person, fireball

monsters.name: Annis Hag

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The annis makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crushing Hug
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target takes 36 (9d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the hag's turns. The hag can't make attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

spells: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She can innately cast the following spells:

spells.Daily (3e): disguise self (including the form of a Medium humanoid), fog cloud

monsters.name: Apprentice Wizard

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spells: The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation

monsters.name: Archdruid

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
actions.desc:
The archdruid magically polymorphs into a beast or elemental with a challenge rating of 6 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 9 hours. The archdruid can choose whether its equipment falls to the ground, melds with its new form, or is worn by the new form. The archdruid reverts to its true form if it dies or falls unconscious. The archdruid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.
While in a new form, the archdruid retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. It can cast its spells with verbal or somatic components in its new form.
The new form's attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistances and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

spells: The archdruid is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, mending, poison spray, produce flame

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, speak with animals

spells.2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, beast sense, hold person

spells.3rd level (3 slots): conjure animals, meld into stone, water breathing

spells.4th level (3 slots): dominate beast, locate creature, stoneskin, wall of fire

spells.5th level (3 slots): commune with nature, mass cure wounds, tree stride

traits.name: Archer's Eye (3/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archer can add {@dice 1d10} to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Arcturia
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Arcturia fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: Arcturia has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Arcturia casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Arcturia uses its Paralyzing Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Arcturia fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Arcturia's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each non-undead creature within 20 feet of Arcturia must make a 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: Arcturia is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). Arcturia can cast {@spell alter self} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, enlarge/reduce, Melf's Acid Arrow, mirror image

spells.5th level (3 slots): animate objects, telekinesis

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The armanite has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The armanite's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The armanite makes three attacks: one with its hooves, one with its claws, and one with its serrated tail.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Serrated Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Lance {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Arrant Quill

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Quill makes two attacks with his dagger and uses Supreme Mockery.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Quill's Fable {@recharge}
actions.desc: Quill utters a short fable while targeting up to five creatures within 30 feet of him that he can see. Each target that can hear Quill's magical fable must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Supreme Mockery
actions.desc: Quill hurls a string of insults laced with enchantments at a creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the creature can hear Quill (though it need not understand him), it must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or take 66 (12d10) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

spells: Quill casts one of the following spells using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 17}):

spells.Daily (3e): detect magic, dispel magic, faerie fire, hold monster

monsters.name: Aruk Thundercaller Thuunlakalaga
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Mountain Born
traits.desc: Aruk is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.desc: Aruk counts as one size larger when determining his carrying capacity and the weight he can push, drag, or lift.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Aruk makes two attacks with his greataxe or hurls two javelins.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When Aruk takes damage, it reduces the damage taken by 9 ({@dice 1d12 + 3}).

monsters.name: Ashdra

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The ashdra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the ashdra to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the ashdra has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The ashdra's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). The ashdra can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Ashtyrranthor
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Ashtyrranthor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ashtyrranthor can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Ashtyrranthor's choice that is within 120 feet of Ashtyrranthor and aware of it must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Ashtyrranthor's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Ashtyrranthor exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 (18d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Ashtyrranthor makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Ashtyrranthor makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Ashtyrranthor beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Ashtyrranthor must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Ashtyrranthor can then fly up to half its flying speed.

spells: Ashtyrranthor's spellcasting ability is Charisma. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): alarm, detect magic, gaseous form, misty step, passwall, see invisibility

monsters.name: Astral Dreadnought
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned

traits.name: Antimagic Cone
traits.desc: The astral dreadnought's opened eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the antimagic field spell, in a 150-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the dreadnought decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the dreadnought's eye is closed or while the dreadnought is blinded.

traits.name: Astral Entity
traits.desc: The astral dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of the Astral Plane.

traits.name: Demiplanar Donjon
traits.desc:
Any creature or object that the astral dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a wish spell or this creature's Donjon Visit ability. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the plane shift spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of the dreadnought's past meals.
The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the astral dreadnought fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: An astral dreadnought's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Sever Silver Cord
traits.desc: If the astral dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling through the Astral Plane by means of the astral projection spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The astral dreadnought makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (5d10 + 9) piercing damage. If the target is a creature of Huge size or smaller and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is incapacitated, the astral dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, appears in an unoccupied space on the floor of the astral dreadnought's Demiplanar Donjon.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (3d6 + 9) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The astral dreadnought makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Donjon Visit (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: One creature that is Huge or smaller that the astral dreadnought can see within 60 feet of it must succeed on a 19 Charisma saving throw or be magically teleported to an unoccupied space on the floor of the astral dreadnought's Demiplanar Donjon. At the end of the target's next turn, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Projection (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the astral dreadnought must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw, taking 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Auril (First Form)
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Divine Being
traits.desc: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

traits.name: Divine Rejuvenation
traits.desc: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body turns to slush and melts away. Auril instantly reappears in her {@creature Auril (second form)|idrotf|second form}, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her first form disappeared. Her initiative count doesn't change.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
traits.desc: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Auril attacks twice with her talons.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Touch of Frost
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) cold damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +13 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) cold damage.

legendary_actions.name: Talons
legendary_actions.desc: Auril attacks once with her talons.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Auril teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her.

legendary_actions.name: Touch of Frost (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Auril uses Touch of Frost.

spells: Auril's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: chromatic orb (cold orb only; see "Actions" below), detect magic, misty step

spells.Daily (2e): control weather, detect thoughts, ice storm

monsters.name: Auril (Second Form)
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Divine Being
traits.desc: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

traits.name: Divine Rejuvenation
traits.desc: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her body collapses into shards of ice, whereupon Auril instantly reappears in her {@creature Auril (third form)|idrotf|third form}, in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of where her second form was destroyed. Her initiative count doesn't change.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day in This Form)
traits.desc: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Auril attacks twice with her ice morningstar or hurls three ice darts.

actions.name: Ice Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Cone of Cold (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Auril causes a magical blast of cold air to erupt from her hand. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Create Ice Mephit (3/Day)
actions.desc: Auril breaks off an icicle from her body and hurls it into an unoccupied space she can see within 20 feet of her, where it magically transforms into an {@creature ice mephit} (see its entry in the Monster Manual). The mephit acts immediately after Auril in the initiative order and obeys her commands.

actions.name: Ice Stasis {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Auril magically creates a gem-sized ice crystal that hovers in a space within 5 feet of her. Auril then targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of the crystal. The target must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or become trapped in the crystal, which is immovable. If the saving throw succeeds, the crystal shatters and nothing else happens. A creature trapped in the crystal is stunned, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the crystal, and takes 21 (6d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the crystal is destroyed, which is a Tiny object with AC 18, 9 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire damage. The freed creature appears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 30 feet of the shattered crystal.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Auril makes one weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ice Flurry (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of Auril takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage from swirling ice, and nonmagical, open flames in that area are extinguished.

legendary_actions.name: Splinter (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Auril uses Create Ice Mephit or causes one to ice mephit she can see within 60 feet of her to explode and die. A mephit that dies in this way does not use its Death Burst. Instead, each creature within 10 feet of the exploding mephit must succeed on a 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) piercing damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Auril (Third Form)
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), truesight 120 ft.

traits.name: Divine Being
traits.desc: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

traits.name: Divine Resurrection
traits.desc: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her crystalline form shatters and her divine spark vanishes. She is dead until the next winter solstice, when she reappears at full health in a cold, remote location of her choosing.

traits.name: Frigid Aura
traits.desc: So long as Auril has at least 1 hit point in this form, each creature within 10 feet of her takes 10 cold damage at the start of each of her turns.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day in This Form)
traits.desc: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Auril uses Polar Ray twice.

actions.name: Polar Ray
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Blizzard Veil
actions.desc: Auril creates a magical blizzard in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on herself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and the sphere moves with Auril. The effect lasts until Auril drops to 0 hit points in this form, until she chooses to end the effect (no action required), or until her concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

legendary_actions.name: Polar Ray
legendary_actions.desc: Auril uses Polar Ray.

legendary_actions.name: Intensify Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Auril's Frigid Aura deals an extra 10 cold damage until the end of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Blinding Gleam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Auril's form flares with a blue light. Each creature that can see Auril and is within 10 feet of her must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded by Auril's magical gleam for 1 minute. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Aurinax can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Aurinax fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Aurinax can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Aurinax's choice that is within 120 feet of Aurinax and aware of it must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Aurinax's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
Aurinax uses one of the following breath weapons.
[object Object]

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Aurinax magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Aurinax's choice).
In a new form, Aurinax retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Aurinax makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Aurinax makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurinax beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Aurinax must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Aurinax can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the aurochs moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Auspicia Dran

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Auspicia makes two attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Auspicia's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Autumn Eladrin

traits.name: Enchanting Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the eladrin for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Foster Peace
reactions.desc: If a creature charmed by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

spells: The eladrin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): cure wounds (as a 5th-level spell), lesser restoration

monsters.name: Avarice
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Icy Doom
traits.desc: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Avarice wields a {@item staff of frost} with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 11 (2d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Staff of Frost
actions.desc: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save 14): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). The staff regains {@dice 1d6 + 4} charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a {@dice d20}; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

reactions.name: Banishing Rebuke (Recharges after a Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When Avarice is damaged by a creature that she can see within 60 feet of her, she can banish that creature to a frigid extradimensional prison for 1 minute. While there, the creature is incapacitated and takes 5 (1d10) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of each of its turns, the creature can make a 14 Charisma saving throw, escaping the prison on a success and reappearing in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. A creature that dies in the prison is trapped there indefinitely.

spells: Avarice is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}; {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, message, minor illusion, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile

monsters.name: Avi

traits.name: Control Water
traits.desc: At will, Avi can control the flow and shape of water in a 5-foot cube, or cause the water to freeze for up to 1 hour.

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Avi can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Avi expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

spells: Avi is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Avi has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary

monsters.name: Babau

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The babau makes two melee attacks. It can also use Weakening Gaze before or after making these attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Weakening Gaze
actions.desc: The babau targets one creature that it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The babau's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The babau can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, dispel magic, fear, heat metal, levitate

monsters.name: Bael

traits.name: Dreadful
traits.desc: Bael can use a bonus action to appear dreadful until the start of his next turn. Each creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Bael fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Bael has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Bael's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Bael regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bael makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Hellish Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of Bael's within 60 feet of him can't be charmed or frightened until the end of his next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Bael magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Bael attacks once with his hellish morningstar.

legendary_actions.name: Awaken Greed
legendary_actions.desc: Bael casts charm person or major image.

legendary_actions.name: Infernal Command
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses his Infernal Command action.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Bael uses his Teleport action.

spells: Bael's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, charm person, detect magic, inflict wounds (as an 8th-level spell), invisibility (self only), major image

spells.Daily (3e): counterspell, dispel magic, fly, suggestion, wall of fire

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If Bak Mei fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Bak Mei carries a staff of striking with 10 charges.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While Bak Mei is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bak Mei attacks three times: twice with Thunder Strike and once with his staff of striking.

actions.name: Thunder Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) thunder damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be deafened and stunned until the start of Bak Mei's next turn.

actions.name: Staff of Striking
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and Bak Mei can expend up to 3 of the staff's charges. For each expended charge, the target takes an extra 1d6 force damage.

actions.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Bak Mei regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on him.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Bak Mei deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 12}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Bak Mei catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Bak Mei has a hand free.

legendary_actions.name: Crane Dance
legendary_actions.desc: Bak Mei moves up to 20 feet. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Thunder Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Bak Mei uses Thunder Strike.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.desc: If the balhannoth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The balhannoth makes a bite attack and up to two tentacle attacks, or it makes up to four tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

legendary_actions.name: Bite Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth makes one bite attack against one creature it has grappled.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has grappled, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Vanish
legendary_actions.desc: The balhannoth magically becomes invisible for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Banderhobb
monsters.languages: Common and the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Resonant Connection
traits.desc: If the banderhobb has even a tiny piece of a creature or an object in its possession, such as a lock of hair or a splinter of wood, it knows the most direct route to that creature or object if it is within 1 mile of the banderhobb.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the banderhobb can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the banderhobb can't use its bite attack or tongue attack on another target.

actions.name: Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and the target must make a 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pulled to a space within 5 feet of the banderhobb, which can use a bonus action to make a bite attack against the target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
The banderhobb makes a bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the banderhobb and it takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the banderhobb's turns. A creature reduced to 0 hit points in this way stops taking necrotic damage and becomes stable.
The banderhobb can have only one target swallowed at a time. While the banderhobb isn't incapacitated, it can regurgitate the creature at any time (no action required) in a space within 5 feet of it. The creature exits prone. If the banderhobb dies, it likewise regurgitates a swallowed creature.

actions.name: Shadow Step
actions.desc: The banderhobb magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space of dim light or darkness that it can see. Before or after teleporting, it can make a bite or tongue attack.

monsters.name: Baphomet

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If Baphomet moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 16 (3d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 25 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.desc: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Baphomet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Baphomet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Baphomet's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of his turn, Baphomet can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Baphomet makes three attacks: one with Heartcleaver, one with his bite, and one with his gore attack.

actions.name: Heartcleaver
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc:
Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Heartcleaver Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet makes a melee attack with Heartcleaver.

legendary_actions.name: Charge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Baphomet moves up to his speed, then makes a gore attack.

spells: Baphomet's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): dispel magic, dominate beast, hunter's mark, maze, wall of stone

monsters.name: Bard

traits.name: Song of Rest
traits.desc: The bard can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra {@dice 1d6} hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. The bard can confer this benefit on itself as well.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.desc: The bard can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the bard, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the bard's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The bard is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, vicious mockery

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave

monsters.name: Barghest
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Goblin, Infernal, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The barghest can use its action to polymorph into a Small goblin or back into its true form. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. The barghest reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Fire Banishment
traits.desc: When the barghest starts its turn engulfed in flames that are at least 10 feet high or wide, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be instantly banished to Gehenna. Instantaneous bursts of flame (such as a red dragon's breath or a fireball spell) don't have this effect on the barghest.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The barghest has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Soul Feeding
traits.desc:
A barghest can feed on the corpse of a humanoid that it killed that has been dead for less than 10 minutes, devouring both flesh and soul in doing so. This feeding takes at least 1 minute, and it destroys the victim's body. The victim's soul is trapped in the barghest for 24 hours, after which time it is digested. If the barghest dies before the soul is digested, the soul is released.
While a humanoid's soul is trapped in a barghest, any form of revival that could work has only a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of doing so, freeing the soul from the barghest if it is successful. Once a creature's soul is digested, however, no mortal magic can return that humanoid to life.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

spells: The barghest's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: levitate, minor illusion, pass without trace

monsters.name: Barnibus Blastwind

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Barnibus carries a {@item wand of magic detection}. (spell included in spell list below but does not use a slot when cast from the wand)

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spells: Barnibus is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks) He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): blade ward, light, mage hand, message

spells.1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, identify, detect magic, mage armor, shield

monsters.name: Belak the Outcast

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

spells: The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, poison spray, shillelagh

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, faerie fire, thunderwave

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: Bepis can move through a space occupied by a creature of a size larger than him

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Bepis has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

monsters.name: Berbalang

traits.name: Spectral Duplicate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc:
As a bonus action, the berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is unconscious. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang drops to 0 hit points or when the berbalang dismisses it (no action required).
The duplicate has the same statistics and knowledge as the berbalang, and everything experienced by the duplicate is known by the berbalang. All damage dealt by the duplicate's attacks is psychic damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The berbalang makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

spells: The berbalang's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}). The berbalang can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Berlain Shadowdusk
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Berlain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Extra Parts
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Berlain can use her extra mouth and arms to cast any cantrip she has prepared.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Berlain is an 18th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Berlain can cast {@spell disguise self} and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force

monsters.name: Bheur Hag

traits.name: Graystaff Magic
traits.desc: The hag carries a graystaff, a length of gray wood that is a focus for her inner power. She can ride the staff as if it were a {@item broom of flying}. While holding the staff, she can cast additional spells with her Innate Spellcasting trait (these spells are marked with an asterisk). If the staff is lost or destroyed, the hag must craft another, which takes a year and a day. Only a bheur hag can use a graystaff.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.desc: The hag can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost her extra moment.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Maddening Feast
actions.desc: The hag feasts on the corpse of one enemy within 5 feet of her that died within the past minute. Each creature of the hag's choice that is within 60 feet of her and able to see her must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature is incapacitated, can't understand what others say, can't read, and speaks only in gibberish; the DM controls the creature's movement, which is erratic. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Maddening Feast for the next 24 hours.

spells: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): cone of cold*, ice storm*, wall of ice*

monsters.name: Bjornhild Solvigsdottir
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Day)
traits.desc: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bjornhild makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the abishai can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes three attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its bite.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Creeping Darkness {@recharge}
actions.desc: The abishai casts darkness at a point within 120 feet of it, requiring no components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Black Guard Drake
monsters.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The guard drake can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of her turns, the Black Viper can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the Black Viper is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The Black Viper deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Black Viper that isn't incapacitated and the Black Viper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Black Viper makes three attacks with her rapier.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The Black Viper halves the damage that she takes from an attack that hits her. She must be able to see the attacker.

monsters.name: Blackguard
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The blackguard is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, protection from evil and good, thunderous smite

traits.name: Blinded
traits.desc: The troll is wearing an eyeless helm, and is blinded.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Blue Abishai

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its quarterstaff and one with its bite.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

spells: The abishai is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). The abishai has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, message, minor illusion, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): chromatic orb, disguise self, expeditious retreat, magic missile, charm person, thunderwave

spells.4th level (3 slots): dimension door, greater invisibility, ice storm

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force

monsters.name: Blue Guard Drake
monsters.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Bodak
monsters.languages: Abyssal, the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Aura of Annihilation
traits.desc: The bodak can activate or deactivate this feature as a bonus action. While active, the aura deals 5 necrotic damage to any creature that ends its turn within 30 feet of the bodak. Undead and fiends ignore this effect.

traits.name: Death Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature that can see the bodak's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of the bodak, the bodak can force it to make a 13 Constitution saving throw if the bodak isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, unless it is immune to the frightened condition. Otherwise, a creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save.
Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the bodak until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the bodak in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.desc: The bodak takes 5 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Withering Gaze
actions.desc: One creature that the bodak can see within 60 feet of it must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Boggle Oil
traits.desc:
The boggle excretes nonflammable oil from its pores. The boggle chooses whether the oil is slippery or sticky and can change the oil on its skin from one consistency to another as a bonus action.
Slippery Oil: While coated in slippery oil, the boggle gains advantage on Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks made to escape bonds, squeeze through narrow spaces, and end grapples.
Sticky Oil: While coated in sticky oil, the boggle gains advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to grapple and any ability check made to maintain a hold on another creature, a surface, or an object. The boggle can also climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Dimensional Rift
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the boggle can create an invisible and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it, provided that the space is no bigger than 10 feet on any side. The dimensional rift bridges the distance between that space and any point within 30 feet of it that the boggle can see or specify by distance and direction (such as "30 feet straight up"). While next to the rift, the boggle can see through it and is considered to be next to the destination as well, and anything the boggle puts through the rift (including a portion of its body) emerges at the destination. Only the boggle can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the boggle's next turn.

traits.name: Uncanny Smell
traits.desc: The boggle has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Pummel
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Oil Puddle
actions.desc:
The boggle creates a puddle of oil that is either slippery or sticky (boggle's choice). The puddle is 1 inch deep and covers the ground in the boggle's space. The puddle is difficult terrain For all creatures except boggles and lasts for 1 hour.
If the oil is slippery, any creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
If the oil is sticky, any creature that enters the puddle's area or starts its turn there must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be restrained. On its turn. a creature can use an action to try to extricate itself from the sticky puddle, ending the effect and moving into the nearest safe unoccupied space with a successful 11 Strength check.

monsters.name: Bol'bara
monsters.alignment: chaotic good (chaotic evil when fully possessed)

traits.name: Dark One's Blessing
traits.desc: When Bol'bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: Bol'bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bol'bara makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: Incorporeal Dash
legendary_actions.desc: Bol'bara moves up to her speed. She can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

legendary_actions.name: Zone of Calamity (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: A 15-foot-radius sphere of magical confusion extends from a point Bol'bara can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. Each creature that starts its turn in that area is treated as if targeted by the confusion spell (save 12). The sphere lasts as long as Bol'bara maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

spells: Bol'bara's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: eldritch blast, false life, mage armor, mage hand

spells.Daily (1e): charm person, hex, hold person, invisibility

monsters.name: Boneclaw
monsters.languages: Common plus the main language of its master

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The boneclaw makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Piercing Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, and the target is grappled (escape 14). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

actions.name: Shadow Jump
actions.desc:
If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or take 34 (5d12 + 2) necrotic damage.
The boneclaw then magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

reactions.name: Deadly Reach
reactions.desc: In response to a visible enemy moving into its reach, the boneclaw makes one claw attack against that enemy. If the attack hits, the boneclaw can make a second claw attack against the target.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Bonnie can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: In the first round of a combat, Bonnie has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If Bonnie surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Bonnie makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.desc: Bonnie magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, Bonnie can continue reading its thoughts, as long as Bonnie's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, Bonnie has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks against the target.

monsters.name: Booyahg Slave of the Archfey

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
