actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Grutha makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The gundren rockseeker has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Gunvald Halraggson
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.desc: Gunvald can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Menacing Blows (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Gunvald deals an extra 6 (1d12) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of Gunvald's next turn.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Gunvald can regain 15 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Gunvald makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 6 (1d12) slashing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 6 (1d12) piercing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 ({@dice 1d6}) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Halaster Blackcloak
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Infernal, Undercommon

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc:
Halaster wears a robe of eyes that lets him see in all directions, gives him darkvision out to a range of 120 feet, grants advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, and allows him to see invisible creatures and objects, as well as into the Ethereal Plane, out to a range of 120 feet.
Halaster wields a blast scepter (a very rare magic item that requires attunement). It can be used as an arcane focus. Whoever is attuned to the blast scepter gains resistance to fire and lightning damage and can, as an action, use it to cast thunderwave as a 4th-level spell (save 16) without expending a spell slot.
Halaster also wears a horned ring (a very rare magic item that requires attunement), which allows an attuned wearer to ignore Undermountain's magical restrictions (see "Alterations to Magic").

traits.name: Arcane Recovery (1/Day)
traits.desc: When he finishes a short rest, Halaster recovers all his spell slots of 5th level and lower.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Halaster fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If Halaster dies in Undermountain, he revives after {@dice 1d10} days, with all his hit points and any missing body parts restored. His new body appears in a random safe location in Undermountain.

actions.name: Blast Scepter
actions.desc: Halaster uses his blast scepter to cast thunderwave as a 4th-level spell. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from him must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@dice 5d8} thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed

legendary_actions.name: Cast Spell
legendary_actions.desc: Halaster casts a spell of 3rd level or lower.

legendary_actions.name: Spell Ward (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Halaster expends a spell slot of 4th level or lower and gains 5 temporary hit points per level of the slot.

spells: Halaster is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 22}, {@hit 14} to hit with spell attacks). He can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will. He can cast {@spell fly} and {@spell lightning bolt} once each without expending a spell slot, but can't do so again until he finishes a short or long rest. Halaster has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield, silent image

spells.2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, cloud of daggers, darkvision, knock

spells.5th level (3 slots): Bigby's hand, geas, wall of force

spells.6th level (2 slots): chain lightning, globe of invulnerability, programmed illusion

monsters.name: Halaster Puppet
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: The puppet is destroyed if a successful dispel magic spell (15) is cast on it

monsters.name: Haungharassk
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Salt Sensitivity
traits.desc: A pound of salt thrown onto the snail's skin deals {@dice 1d6} acid damage to the creature.

traits.name: Magical Properties
traits.desc: A creature that uses an action to touch the living snail gains 6 temporary hit points that last for 24 hours. Any creature or object that touches the living snail also gains the benefit of a remove curse spell. The snail loses these magical properties if it dies.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The snail can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

monsters.name: Hedrun Arnsfirth
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Hedrun has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hedrun attacks twice with Grave Bolt.

actions.name: Grave Bolt
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under Hedrun's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. Hedrun can have no more than twelve {@creature zombie||zombies} under its control at one time.

spells: Hedrun's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no verbal or material components:

spells.At will: detect magic, disguise self, mage armor

monsters.name: Hellfire Engine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The hellfire engine is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hellfire engine has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Flesh-Crushing Stride
actions.desc:
The hellfire engine moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the hellfire engine enters must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed to the nearest space out of the hellfire engine's path. On a failed save, the creature falls prone and takes 28 (8d6) bludgeoning damage.
If the hellfire engine remains in the prone creature's space, the creature is also restrained until it's no longer in the same space as the hellfire engine. While restrained in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a 18 Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the hellfire engine and is no longer restrained.

actions.name: Hellfire Weapons
actions.desc:
The hellfire engine uses one of the following options:
[object Object]
If the chosen option kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Parry

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

monsters.name: Hlam

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.desc: Hlam's unarmed strikes are magical.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hlam attacks three times using his unarmed strike, darts, or both.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 ({@dice 1d10 + 7}) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:
The target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Hlam's choice).
The target must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hlam's next turn.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 9 (1d4 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Quivering Palm {@recharge}
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. The target must make a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 (10d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Wholeness of Body (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Hlam regains 60 hit points.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Hlam deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 27}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Hlam catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and he has a hand free.

reactions.name: Slow Fall
reactions.desc: Hlam reduces the bludgeoning damage he takes from a fall by 100.

legendary_actions.name: Quick Step
legendary_actions.desc: Hlam moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hlam makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Invisibility (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hlam becomes invisible until the end of his next turn. The effect ends if Hlam attacks or casts a spell.

spells: Hlam is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks) He has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, sacred flame, spare the dying

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect evil and good, healing word, sanctuary, shield of faith

spells.2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, prayer of healing, silence

spells.3rd level (2 slots): protection from energy, remove curse, sending

monsters.name: Hobgoblin Devastator

traits.name: Arcane Advantage
traits.desc: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Army Arcana
traits.desc: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The hobgoblin is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, Melf's acid arrow, scorching ray

monsters.name: Hobgoblin Iron Shadow

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the hobgoblin is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hobgoblin makes four attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack. It can also use Shadow Jaunt once, either before or after one of the attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Jaunt
actions.desc: The hobgoblin magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it is leaving and its destination must be in dim light or darkness.

spells: The hobgoblin is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): minor illusion, prestidigitation, true strike

spells.1st level (3 slots): charm person, disguise self, expeditious retreat, silent image

monsters.name: Horned Sister
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The horned sister is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The horned sister has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The howler makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Rending Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is frightened it takes an additional 22 (4d10) psychic damage. This attack ignores damage resistance.

actions.name: Mind-Breaking Howl {@recharge}
actions.desc: The howler emits a keening howl in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area that isn't deafened must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is frightened in this way, its speed is halved, and it is incapacitated. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Hrabbaz can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.desc: When Hrabbaz is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Extra Damage
traits.desc: As long as Hrabbaz has more than half his hit points left he deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on all hits.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hrabbaz makes three attacks with his morningstar.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Hulil Lutan

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Hulil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The hulil lutan has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hulil makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Hulil is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). Hulil has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith

monsters.name: Hutijin

traits.name: Infernal Despair
traits.desc: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Hutijin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Hutijin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Hutijin's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Hutijin regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Hutijin makes four attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, one with his mace, and one with his tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 (3d6) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Hutijin magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reactions.name: Fearful Voice {@recharge 5}
reactions.desc: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to Hutijin's Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin attacks once with his mace.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin releases lightning in a 20-foot radius. All other creatures in that area must each make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Hutijin uses his Teleport action.

spells: Hutijin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, detect magic, hold monster, invisibility (self only), lightning bolt, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Hydroloth

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hydroloth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hydroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The hydroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.desc: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Watery Advantage
traits.desc: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hydroloth makes two melee attacks. In place of one of these attacks, it can cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Steal Memory (1/Day)
actions.desc: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes {@dice 4d6} psychic damage, and it must make a 16 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. On a failed save, the target loses all proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and if its Intelligence and Charisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A greater restoration or remove curse spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The hydroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), water walk

spells.Daily (3e): control water, crown of madness, fear, phantasmal killer, suggestion

monsters.name: Illusionist

traits.name: Displacement (Recharges after the Illusionist Casts an Illusion Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the illusionist projects an illusion that makes the illusionist appear to be standing in a place a few inches from its actual location, causing any creature to have disadvantage on attack rolls against the illusionist. The effect ends if the illusionist takes damage, it is incapacitated, or its speed becomes 0.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The illusionist is a 7th-level spellcaster. its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The illusionist has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray

spells.1st level (4 slots): color spray*, disguise self*, mage armor, magic missile

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The irisoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put The irisoth to sleep.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Iron Cobra
monsters.damage_immunities: poison,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The iron cobra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or suffer one random poison effect:
1. Poison Damage: The target takes 13 (3d8) poison damage.
2. Confusion: On its next turn, the target must use its action to make one weapon attack against a random creature it can see within 30 feet of it, using whatever weapon it has in hand and moving beforehand if necessary to get in range. If it's holding no weapon, it makes an unarmed strike. If no creature is visible within 30 feet, it takes the Dash action, moving toward the nearest creature.
3. Paralysis: The target is paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Iron Spider
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Web Cable
actions.desc: The iron spider shoots out a 6-inch-thick web cable up to 50 feet long, attaching the far end of the cable to a solid surface up to 50 feet away from it. As a bonus action, it can detach the other end of the cable from itself and attach it to a solid surface within 10 feet of it. Once it creates 200 feet of web cable, the spider can't produce any more cable until the next dawn.

monsters.name: Isarr Kronenstrom
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: Isarr has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.desc: Isarr can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: Isarr has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Isarr makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Sickle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, plus 13 (2d12) piercing damage if the target has no allies it can see within 10 feet of it.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Ishel

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Ishel has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Ishel to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Ishel has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

spells: Ishel's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Istrid Horn

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Istrid has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Istrid makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Treasure Sense (3/Day)
actions.desc: Istrid magically pinpoints precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.

spells: Istrid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks) She has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying

spells.1st level (4 slots): divine favor, guiding bolt, healing word, shield of faith

spells.2nd level (3 slots): lesser restoration, magic weapon, hold person, silence, spiritual weapon

spells.3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, revivify, spirit guardians, water walk

spells.4th level (3 slots): banishment, freedom of movement, guardian of faith, stoneskin

spells.5th level (1 slots): flame strike, mass cure wounds, hold monster

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While Jade Tigress is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jade Tigress makes three attacks.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the of Jade Tigress's next turn.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion.

actions.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Jade Tigress regains {@dice 2d8 + 2} hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on her.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Jade Tigress deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Jade Tigress catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Jade Tigress has a hand free.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Jalester carries a {@item badge of the Watch|wdh}.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Jalester can regain 16 ({@dice 1d10 + 11}) hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jalester makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.desc: When a creature that Jalester can see misses him with a melee attack, he can use his reaction to make a melee weapon attack against that creature. On a hit, the target takes an extra 4 damage from the weapon.

monsters.name: Jandar Chergoba

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Jandar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jandar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Jandar's spellcasting ability is Charisma. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Grugnur makes two longsword attacks.

actions.name: Longsword +2
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (3d8 + 10) slashing damage, or 26 (3d10 + 10) slashing damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Jarlaxle Baenre
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Undercommon

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Jarlaxle wears {@item +3 leather armor}, a {@item hat of disguise}, a {@item bracer of flying daggers|wdh}, a {@item cloak of invisibility}, a {@item knave's eye patch|wdh}, and a {@item ring of truth telling|wdh}. He wields a {@item +3 rapier} and carries a {@item portable hole} and a {@item wand of web}. His hat is adorned with a {@item feather of diatryma summoning|wdh}.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Jarlaxle instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Jarlaxle has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If Jarlaxle fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master Attuner
traits.desc: Jarlaxle can attune to up to five magic items, and he can attune to magic items that normally require attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Jarlaxle deals an extra 24 ({@dice 7d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jarlaxle's that isn't incapacitated and Jarlaxle doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.desc: While Jarlaxle is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: When not wearing his knave's eye patch, Jarlaxle has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jarlaxle makes three attacks with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.

actions.name: +3 Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (1d8 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Flying Dagger
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Quick Step
legendary_actions.desc: Jarlaxle moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Jarlaxle makes one attack with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.

spells: Jarlaxle's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks) He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Jarund Elkhardt
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Jarund hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jarund makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Jim Darkmagic

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Jim carries a {@item wand of wonder}.

traits.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Jim teleports up to 30 feet to a space he can see. The space must be unoccupied or occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature. If the latter, Jim and the willing creature both teleport, swapping places.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Minor Conjuration
actions.desc: Jim conjures an inanimate object, no larger than 3 feet on a side and no more than 10 pounds, in his hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space he can see within 10 feet of him. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet. It disappears if it takes any damage, after 1 hour, or when Jim uses this feature again.

spells: Jim is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): disguise self, Jim's magic missile|AI*, mage armor

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Jot can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a bat (speed 10 feet fly 40 ft.), a centipede (40 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Jot has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Claw (Bite in Beast Form)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Scare (1/Day)
actions.desc: One creature of Jot's choice within 20 feet of it must succeed on a 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if Jot is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: Jot magically turns invisible until it attacks or uses Scare, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Jot wears or carries is invisible with it.

monsters.name: Juiblex
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned, unconscious

traits.name: Foul
traits.desc: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Juiblex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Juiblex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Juiblex's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Juiblex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Juiblex can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Juiblex makes three acid lash attacks.

actions.name: Acid Lash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (4d6 + 7) acid damage. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, and the corpse is obliterated after 1 minute.

actions.name: Eject Slime {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the target takes 55 (10d10) acid damage. Unless the target avoids taking any of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon it is carrying or wearing takes a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to −5, the object is destroyed.

legendary_actions.name: Acid Splash
legendary_actions.desc: Juiblex casts acid splash.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Juiblex makes one acid lash attack.

legendary_actions.name: Corrupting Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 21 (4d6 + 7) poison damage, and the target is slimed. Until the slime is scraped off with an action, the target is poisoned, and any creature, other than an ooze, is poisoned while within 10 feet of the target.

spells: Juiblex's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). Juiblex can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): blight, contagion, gaseous form

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: K'thriss wears a {@item robe of stars} (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: magic missile (7 missiles)

traits.name: Awakened Mind
traits.desc: K'thriss can telepathically speak to any creature he can see within 30 feet of him, provided the creature can understand at least one language.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.desc: When K'Tulah moves on her turn in combat, she can double her speed until the end of the turn. Once she uses this ability, K'Tulah can't use it again until she moves 0 feet on one of her turns.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) slashing damage.

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh

spells.1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

traits.name: Art Imitates Life (3/Day)
traits.desc: Kalain touches one of her paintings and causes its subject to spring forth, becoming a creature of that kind provided its CR is 3 or lower. The creature appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the painting, which becomes blank. The creature is friendly toward Kalain and hostile toward all others. It rolls initiative to determine when it acts. It disappears after 1 minute, when it is reduced to 0 hit points, or when Kalain dies or falls unconscious.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.desc: Kalain can use a bonus action on her turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear Kalain, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Kalain's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Kalain is a 4th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma. She has the following bard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, vicious mockery

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Kalka-Kylla can breathe air and water.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While Kalka-Kylla remains motionless and hidden in its shell, it is indistinguishable from a polished boulder.

traits.name: Shell
traits.desc: Kalka-Kylla can use a bonus action to retract into or emerge from its shell. While retracted, Kalka-Kylla gains a +4 bonus to AC, and it has a speed of 0 and can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Kalka-Kylla makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Kalka-Kylla has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Living Shadow
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon has resistance to damage that isn't force, psychic, or radiant.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the dragon can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the dragon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.
[object Object]

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).
In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

traits.name: Fey Ancestry

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Keresta Delvingstone
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc:
If Keresta isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in bat form, Keresta can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, Keresta can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Keresta fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.desc:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, Keresta transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.
While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Keresta regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If Keresta takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of Keresta's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Keresta can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc:
Keresta has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} Keresta can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} Keresta takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into Keresta's heart while Keresta is incapacitated in its resting place, Keresta is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} Keresta takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Keresta makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Keresta can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by Keresta, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Keresta regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under Keresta's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
Keresta targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see Keresta, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by Keresta. The charmed target regards Keresta as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under Keresta's control, it takes Keresta's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for Keresta's bite attack.
Each time Keresta or Keresta's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Keresta is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature giant centipede||giant centipedes} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Keresta moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.desc: Keresta makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Keresta makes one bite attack.

spells: Keresta is a 9th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, command, inflict wounds, ray of sickness

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, ray of enfeeblement, spiritual weapon

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, bestow curse, dispel magic, spirit guardians

traits.name: Dragon's Resistance

traits.name: Heart of the Dragon
traits.desc: If the kobold is frightened or paralyzed by an effect that allows a saving throw, it can repeat the save at the start of its turn to end the effect on itself and all kobolds within 30 feet of it. Any kobold that benefits from this trait (including the dragonshield) has advantage on its next attack roll.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger

actions.name: Weapon Invention
actions.desc:
The kobold uses one of the following options (roll a {@dice d8} or choose one); the kobold can use each one no more than once per day:
[object Object]

monsters.name: Kobold Scale Sorcerer

traits.name: Sorcery Points
traits.desc:
The kobold has 3 sorcery points. It regains all its spent sorcery points when it finishes a long rest. It can spend its sorcery points on the following options:
Heightened Spell: When it casts a spell that forces a creature to a saving throw to resist the spell's effects, the kobold can spend 3 sorcery points to give one target of the spell disadvantage on its first saving throw against the spell.
Subtle Spell: When the kobold casts a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to cast the spell without any somatic or verbal components.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature it at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The kobold is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, mending, poison spray

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, chromatic orb, expeditious retreat

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of Kol'daan must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Kol'daan has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sparring Sword

monsters.name: Korred

traits.name: Command Hair
traits.desc:
The korred has at least one 50-foot-long rope woven out of its hair. As a bonus action, the korred commands one such rope within 30 feet of it to move up to 20 feet and entangle a Large or smaller creature that the korred can see. The target must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or become grappled by the rope (escape 13). Until this grapple ends. the target is restrained. The korred can use a bonus action to release the target, which is also freed if the korred dies or becomes incapacitated.
A rope of korred hair has AC 20 and 20 hit points. It regains 1 hit point at the start of each of the korred's turns while it has at least 1 hit point and the korred is alive. If the rope drops to 0 hit points, it is destroyed.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The korred has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Stone's Strength
traits.desc: While on the ground, the korred deals 2 extra dice of damage with any weapon attack (included in its attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The korred makes two attacks with its greatclub or hurls two rocks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage, or 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage if the korred is on the ground.

spells: The korred's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: commune with nature, meld into stone, stone shape

spells.Daily (1e): conjure elemental (as 6th-level spell; {@creature galeb duhr}, {@creature gargoyle}, {@creature earth elemental}, or {@creature xorn} only), Otto's irresistible dance

monsters.name: Kraken Priest

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The priest can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Thunderous Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 27 (5d10) thunder damage.

actions.name: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest's choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The priest's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk

monsters.name: Krebbyg Masq'il'yr

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Krebbyg has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Krebbyg to sleep.

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.desc: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on Krebbyg's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, Krebbyg ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Krebbyg has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Krebbyg makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

spells: Krebbyg's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}) It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

actions.name: Stab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The kruthik sprays acid in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Laeral Silverhand
monsters.languages: Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Giant, Infernal

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Laeral wears a white {@item robe of the archmagi} (accounted for in her statistics). She wields a {@item flame tongue longsword}.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: While wearing her robe of the archmagi, Laeral has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Laeral makes three attacks with her silver hair and flame tongue, in any combination. She can cast one of her cantrips or 1st-level spells before or after making these attacks.

actions.name: Silver Hair
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d6) force damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Flame Tongue
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Spellfire (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc:
Magical, heatless, silver fire harmlessly erupts from Laeral and surrounds her until she is incapacitated or until she uses an action to quench it. She gains one of the following benefits of her choice, which lasts until the silver fire ends:
[object Object]
While the silver fire is present, she has the following additional action options:
[object Object]

spells: Laeral is a 19th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 13} to hit with spell attacks). Laeral has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level: detect magic, disguise self, magic missile, shield

spells.4th level (3 slots): banishment, greater invisibility, Otiluke's resilient sphere

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, geas, Rary's telepathic bond

monsters.name: Lahnis

traits.name: Sculpt Spells
traits.desc: When Lahnis casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: Lahnis is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Lahnis has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt*, light*, prestidigitation, ray of frost*

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands*, mage armor, magic missile*

monsters.name: Laiba "Nana" Rosse

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Laiba has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Laiba makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Laiba's spellcasting ability is Charisma. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The leucrotta has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Kicking Retreat
traits.desc: If the leucrotta attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The leucrotta can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 14 Wisdom (Insight) check.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When the leucrotta reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make an attack with its hooves.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The leucrotta makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its hooves.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the leucrotta scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Leviathan
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Partial Freeze
traits.desc: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

traits.name: Water Form
traits.desc: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The leviathan makes two attacks: one with its slam and one with its tail.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 15 (1d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 5 (1d10) acid damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (1d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) acid damage.

actions.name: Tidal Wave {@recharge}
actions.desc:
While submerged, the leviathan magically creates a wall of water centered on itself. The wall is up 250 feet long, up to 250 feet high, and up to 50 feet thick. When the wall appears, all other creatures within its area must each make a 24 Strength saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
At the start of each of the leviathan's turns after the wall appears, the wall, along with any other creatures in it, moves 50 feet away from the leviathan. Any Huge or smaller creature inside the wall or whose space the wall enters when it moves must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or take 27 (5d10) bludgeoning damage. A creature takes this damage no more than once on a turn. At the end of each turn the wall moves, the wall's height is reduced by 50 feet, and the damage creatures take from the wall on subsequent rounds is reduced by {@dice 1d10}. When the wall reaches 0 feet in height, the effect ends.
A creature caught in the wall can move by swimming. Because of the force of the wave, though, the creature must make a successful 24 Strength (Athletics) check to swim at all during that turn.

legendary_actions.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The leviathan makes one slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The leviathan moves up to its speed.

monsters.name: Lhammaruntosz

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Lhammaruntosz can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Lhammaruntosz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Lhammaruntosz regains 5 hit points at the start of her turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Lhammaruntosz's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Lhammaruntosz's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz uses one of the following breath weapons.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz exhales lightning in a 90- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Lhammaruntosz magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lhammaruntosz's choice).
In a new form, Lhammaruntosz retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Lhammaruntosz beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Lhammaruntosz must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Lhammaruntosz can then fly up to half her flying speed.

spells: Lhammaruntosz's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): create food and water, detect thoughts, fog cloud, speak with animals

monsters.name: Losser Mirklav

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: Losser can move through the space of a creature that is a size bigger than him.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Losser has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Lumalia

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: Lumalia's weapon attacks are magical. When Lumalia hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Lumalia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Lumalia makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: Lumalia touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Lumalia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lumalia's choice).
In a new form, Lumalia retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

spells: Lumalia's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). Lumalia can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

monsters.name: Maddgoth's Homunculus
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Gnomish but can't speak

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2d6 + 2 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) minutes and unconscious while poisoned in this way.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Umbero has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The steeder can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Extraordinary Leap
traits.desc: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Sticky Leg
