actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. The target is stuck to the steeder's leg and is grappled until it escapes (escape 12). The steeder can have only one creature grappled at a time.

monsters.name: Manafret Cherryport

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: Manafret can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Manafret has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Manshoon
monsters.languages: Common, Draconic, Goblin, Infernal, Orc, Undercommon

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Manshoon wears a black {@item robe of the archmagi} and wields a {@item staff of power} (both accounted for in his statistics). Roll {@dice 2d10} to determine how many charges the staff has remaining.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: While wearing his robe of the archmagi, Manshoon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Metal Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Staff of Power
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands. Manshoon can expend 1 of the staff's charges to deal an extra 3 (1d6) force damage on a hit.

spells: Manshoon is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): Bigby's hand, scrying, wall of force

spells.6th level (1 slots): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability

monsters.name: Manshoon Simulacrum
monsters.languages: Common, Draconic, Goblin, Infernal, Orc, Undercommon

actions.name: Metal Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

spells: Manshoon is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 21}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): Bigby's hand, scrying, wall of force

monsters.name: Marta Moonshadow
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Marta has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The marta moonshadow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put The marta moonshadow to sleep.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Marta is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Marta has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:
[object Object]

actions.name: Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 3}. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.

monsters.name: Marut

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The marut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the marut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The marut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The marut makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Unerring Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 60 force damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the marut if it is Huge or smaller.

actions.name: Blazing Edict {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Arcane energy emanates from the marut's chest in a 60-foot cube. Every creature in that area takes 45 radiant damage. Each creature that takes any of this damage must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of the marut's next turn.

actions.name: Justify
actions.desc:
The marut targets up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 20 Charisma saving throw or be teleported to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil. A target fails automatically if it is incapacitated. If either target is teleported in this way, the marut teleports with it to the circle.
After teleporting in this way, the marut can't use this action again until it finishes a short or long rest.

spells: The marut's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}). The marut can innately cast the following spell, requiring no material components.

monsters.name: Master Thief
monsters.languages: any one language (usually Common) plus Thieves' cant

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The thief deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't incapacitated and the thief doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thief makes three attacks with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.

monsters.name: Mattrim "Threestrings" Mereg

traits.name: Song of Rest
traits.desc: Mattrim can perform a song while taking a short rest. Any ally who hears the song regains an extra {@dice 1d6} hit points if it spends any Hit Dice to regain hit points at the end of that rest. Mattrim can confer this benefit on itself as well.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.desc: Mattrim can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear Mattrim, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Mattrim's next turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Mattrim is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, vicious mockery

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, healing word, heroism, sleep, thunderwave

traits.name: Assume Form
traits.desc: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium humanoid it has eaten. It remains in this form for {@dice 1d6} days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The maurezhi has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The maurezhi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, its Charisma score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Charisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a ghoul, unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Raise Ghoul {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the maw demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the meazel can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Garrote
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target of the meazel's size or smaller. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13 with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.
Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed by shadow for 1 hour. Until this curse ends, every undead and every creature native to the Shadowfell within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.desc: Any beast or humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the creature's next turn.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Melannor Fellbranch

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Melannor has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit or Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

spells: Melannor is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom. He has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh

spells.1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

monsters.name: Melissara Shadowdusk
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Melissara has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Melissara is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Melissara can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Meloon wields {@item Azuredge|wdh} but can't attune to it, and thus gains none of its benefits.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Meloon can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Meloon can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Meloon makes four attacks with Azuredge.

actions.name: Azuredge
actions.desc: {@atk m} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Mennek Ariz

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Instinctive Charm (Recharges after the Enchanter Casts an Enchantment Spell of 1st level or Higher)
reactions.desc:
Mennek tries to magically divert an attack made against it, provided that the attacker is within 30 feet of it and visible to it. Mennek must decide to do so before the attack hits or misses.
The attacker must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker targets the creature closest to it, other than Mennek or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target.

spells: Mennek is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Mennek has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): friends, mage hand, mending, message

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person*, mage armor, magic missile

monsters.name: Merregon
monsters.languages: understands Infernal but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the merregon's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merregon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend of challenge rating 6 or higher is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks.

actions.name: Halberd
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Loyal Bodyguard
reactions.desc: When another fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

monsters.name: Merrenoloth

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The merrenoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The merrenoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrenoloth uses Fear Gaze once and makes one oar attack.

actions.name: Oar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fear Gaze
actions.desc: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The merrenoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, gust of wind

monsters.name: Miirym
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft.; see also "x-ray vision" below

traits.name: Bound to Candlekeep
traits.desc: Miirym can't leave Candlekeep and is immune to any effect that would place her in a location outside it, including an extradimensional space. If she dies, Miirym regains her form and all her hit points after {@dice 1d10} days, reappearing in the location where she died or in the nearest unoccupied space.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Miirym regains 40 hit points at the start of her turn. If Miirym takes damage from a magic weapon or a spell, this trait doesn't function at the start of Miirym's next turn. Miirym dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: Miirym can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Miirym fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: X-Ray Vision
traits.desc: Miirym can see through solid matter out to a range of 60 feet. To her, opaque creatures, objects, and obstacles within that distance appear transparent and don't prevent light from passing through them. This vision can penetrate 5 feet of stone, 3 inches of common metal, and up to 10 feet of wood or dirt. Thicker substances block this vision, as does a thin sheet of lead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 34 (9d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Miirym uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Cold Breath
actions.desc: Miirym exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Necrotic Breath
actions.desc: Miirym exhales a bolt of necrotic energy in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 82 (15d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.desc: Miirym exhales paralyzing gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Miirym's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Miirym's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.desc: Miirym makes a bite attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Miirym magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

spells: Miirym casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 21}) and requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, locate creature

spells.Daily (1e): dispel evil and good, wall of force

traits.name: Telepathic Hub
traits.desc: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mindwitness makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 20 (4d8 + 2) psychic damage. if the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape 13) and must succeed on a 13 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc:
The mindwitness shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:
[object Object]

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Mirt wears {@item bracers of defense} and a {@item ring of regeneration}. He wields a {@item +1 longsword} and a {@item +1 dagger}.

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Mirt hits with it (included in the attacks below).

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Mirt instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Mirt deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Mirt's that isn't incapacitated and Mirt doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Mirt makes three attacks: two with his +1 longsword and one with his +1 dagger.

actions.name: +1 Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: +1 Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Mirt adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Mirt must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Mjenir
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

spells: Mjenir is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh

spells.1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

monsters.name: Mobar
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Mobar can use its action to polymorph into a Medium bat-humanoid hybrid, or into a Large giant bat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Echolocation (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
traits.desc: Mobar has blindsight out to a range of 60 feet as long as it's not deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: Mobar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Nimble Escape (Humanoid Form Only)
traits.desc: Mobar can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Mobar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Blind Eye
traits.desc: Due to poor depth perception, Mobar has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: In humanoid form, Mobar makes two scimitar attacks or two shortbow attacks. In hybrid form, it can make one bite attack and one scimitar attack.

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and Mobar gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebat lycanthropy.

actions.name: Scimitar (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Moloch

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Moloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Moloch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Moloch's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Moloch regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Moloch makes three attacks: one with his bite, one with his claw, and one with his whip.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Many-Tailed Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 13 (2d4 + 8) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) lightning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 24 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

actions.name: Breath of Despair {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage, drop whatever it is holding, and become frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: Moloch magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary_actions.name: Stinking Cloud
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch casts stinking cloud.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch uses his Teleport action.

legendary_actions.name: Whip
legendary_actions.desc: Moloch makes one attack with his whip.

spells: Moloch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), animate dead, burning hands (as a 7th-level spell), confusion, detect magic, fly, geas, major image, stinking cloud, suggestion, wall of fire

monsters.name: Molydeus
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the molydeus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The molydeus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The molydeus's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The molydeus makes three attacks: one with its weapon, one with its wolf bite, and one with its snakebite.

actions.name: Demonic Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) slashing damage. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra {@dice 6d8} slashing damage from the hit.

actions.name: Wolf Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Snakebite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 12 (1d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target transforms into a {@creature manes} if this reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus makes one attack, either with its demonic weapon or with its snakebite.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus moves without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The molydeus casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait.

spells: The molydeus's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 22}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Morkoth

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The morkoth can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The morkoth makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tentacles or three with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends. the target is restrained and takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the morkoth's turns. and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

actions.name: Hypnosis
actions.desc: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Each creature in that area must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the morkoth for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to Dash until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A charmed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.desc: If the morkoth makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the morkoth can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 120 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the morkoth. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

spells: The morkoth is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The morkoth has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, mage hand, mending, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, shield, witch bolt

spells.5th level (3 slots): geas, scrying

monsters.name: Mormesk the Wraith
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The wraith can move through an object or another creature, but can't stop there.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. If this attack reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

monsters.name: Mossback Steward
monsters.languages: telepathy 120 ft, understands Goblin, Common, and Primordial but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Mossback Steward can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Massive Frame
traits.desc:
Mossback Steward can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath Mossback Steward while it's not prone.
Any creature under Mossback Steward when it falls prone is grappled (escape 18). Until the grapple ends, the creature is prone and restrained.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense {@recharge 4}
actions.desc: Mossback Steward withdraws into its shell, falls prone, and gains a +5 bonus to AC. While Mossback Steward is in its shell, its speed is 0 and can't increase. Mossback Steward can emerge from its shell as an action, whereupon it is no longer prone.

spells: Mossback Steward's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

traits.name: Mouth of Madness
traits.desc:
The giant is immune to confusion spells and similar magic.
On each of its turns, the giant uses all its movement to move toward the nearest creature or whatever else it might perceive as food. Roll a {@dice d10} at the start of each of the giant's turns to determine its action for that turn:
1–3. The giant makes three attacks with its fists against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
4–5. The giant makes one attack with its fist against every creature within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant makes one fist attack against itself.
6–7. The giant makes one attack with its bite against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, its eyes glaze over and it becomes stunned until the start of its next turn.
8–10. The giant makes three attacks against one random target within its reach: one attack with its bite and two with its fists. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Muiral
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Muiral fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Muiral makes three attacks: two with his longsword and one with his sting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. The target must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Cast Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Muiral casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Lunging Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Muiral makes one longsword attack that has a reach of 10 feet.

legendary_actions.name: Retreating Strike (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Muiral moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Before the move, he can make one longsword attack.

spells: Muiral is a 13th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, fog cloud, magic missile, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): darkness, knock, see invisibility, spider climb

monsters.name: Môrgæn

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Môrgæn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Môrgæn makes three attacks with her scimitars or her longbow.

actions.name: Scimitars
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

spells: Môrgæn's spellcasting ability is Intelligence. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Demonic Shadows
traits.desc: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

traits.name: Devour Soul
traits.desc: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a construct nor an undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice ({@dice d8}s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a wish spell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nabassu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The nabassu's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nabassu uses its Soul-Stealing Gaze and makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 32 (4d12 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
actions.desc: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the nabassu and isn't a construct or an undead, it must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or reduce its hit point maximum by 13 ({@dice 2d12}) damage and give the nabassu an equal number of temporary hit points. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0, and if the target is a humanoid, it immediately rises as a {@creature ghoul} under the nabassu's control.

monsters.name: Nagpa
monsters.languages: Common plus up to five other languages

traits.name: Corruption
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a 20 Charisma saving throw. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. On a successful save, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Paralysis {@recharge}
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Undead and constructs are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The nagpa is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit 12} to hit with spell attacks). A nagpa has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, mage hand, message, minor illusion

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, detect magic, protection from evil and good, witch bolt

spells.2nd level (3 slots): hold person, ray of enfeeblement, suggestion

spells.4th level (3 slots): confusion, hallucinatory terrain, wall of fire

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.desc: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) and Charisma ({@skill Deception}, {@skill Intimidation}, and {@skill Persuasion}) checks against the target.

monsters.name: Nar'l Xibrindas

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Nar'l has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Nar'l to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Nar'l has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Nar'l carries a vial containing three doses of eyescratch, a contact poison. A creature that comes into contact with the poison must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour and blinded while poisoned in this way. A lesser restoration spell or similar magic ends the effect.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands, plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
actions.desc: Nar'l magically summons a {@creature quasit}, or attempts to summon a {@creature shadow demon} with a {@chance 50|50 percent|50% summoning chance} chance of success. The summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spells: Nar'l's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Diabolical Sense
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

traits.name: Infernal Tack
traits.desc: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its {@creature nightmare} companion.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The narzugon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The narzugon uses its Infernal Command or Terrifying Command. It also makes three hellfire lance attacks.

actions.name: Hellfire Lance
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) fire damage. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours.
If the creature isn't revived before then, only a wish spell or killing the lemure and casting true resurrection on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Infernal Command
actions.desc: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be charmed or frightened until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

actions.name: Terrifying Command
actions.desc:
Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear it must succeed on a 17 Charisma saving throw or become frightened of it for 1 minute.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

actions.name: Healing (1/Day)
actions.desc: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

monsters.name: Nass Lantomir's Ghost
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.desc: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.desc: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages {@dice 1d4 × 10} years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed by a greater restoration spell, but only if it is cast within 24 hours.

actions.name: Possession {@recharge}
actions.desc: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spells: The ghost is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}). The ghost has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, thunderwave

monsters.name: Necromancer

traits.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
traits.desc: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.

spells: The necromancer is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The necromancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, mending

spells.1st level (4 slots): false life*, mage armor, ray of sickness*

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead*, bestow curse*, vampiric touch*

monsters.name: Nedylene

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Nedylene carries a {@item staff of swarming insects}.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Nedylene has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Nedylene to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Nedylene has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Nedylene makes two scourge attacks.

actions.name: Scourge +2
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Summon Demon (1/Day)
actions.desc: Nedylene attempts to magically summon a {@creature yochlol} with a {@chance 30|30 percent|30% summoning chance} chance of success. If the attempt fails, Nedylene takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage. Otherwise, the summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

spells: Nedylene's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
traits.desc: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The neogi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
traits.desc: The hatchling has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the hatchling to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The hatchling can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Neogi Master
monsters.languages: Common, Deep Speech, Undercommon, telepathy 30 ft.

traits.name: Mental Fortitude
traits.desc: The neogi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened, and magic can't put the neogi to sleep.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The neogi can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The neogi makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The neogi is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): eldritch blast (range 300 ft., +4 bonus to each damage roll), guidance, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery

spells.4th level (2 slots): arms of Hadar, counterspell, dimension door, fear, hold person, hunger of Hadar, invisibility, unseen servant

monsters.name: Neothelid

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.desc: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The neothelid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the neothelid. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the neothelid, and it takes 35 (10d6) acid damage at the start of each of the neothelid's turns.
If the neothelid takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the neothelid must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the neothelid. If the neothelid dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The neothelid exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The neothelid's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Nerozar the Defeated
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces Nerozar to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Nerozar drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.desc:
The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing a target that it can see within 60 feet of it.
[object Object]

monsters.name: Nester
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.languages: Auran, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Giant, Terran

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Nester has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Nester is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Nester can cast {@spell disguise self} and {@spell invisibility} at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, Rary's telepathic bond, wall of force

monsters.name: Nezznar the Black Spider

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Nezznar has a {@item spider staff|lmop}.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Nezznar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: Nezznar has disadvantage on attack rolls when he or his target is in sunlight.

actions.name: Spider Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

spells: Nezznar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Nightwalker
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Annihilating Aura
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the nightwalker must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and grant the nightwalker advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of the creature's next turn. Undead are immune to this aura.

traits.name: Life Eater
traits.desc: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the nightwalker dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nightwalker uses Enervating Focus twice, or it uses Enervating Focus and Finger of Doom, if available.

actions.name: Enervating Focus
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 28 (5d8 + 6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Finger of Doom {@recharge}
actions.desc: The nightwalker points at one creature it can see within 300 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 21 Wisdom saving throw or take 26 (4d12) necrotic damage and become frightened until the end of the nightwalker's next turn. While frightened in this way, the creature is also paralyzed. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the nightwalker's Finger of Doom for the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Nihiloor

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Nihiloor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 15) and must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by Nihiloor. The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Nihiloor kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Nihiloor magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: Nihiloor's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Nilbog

traits.name: Nilbogism
traits.desc: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Fool's Scepter
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Reversal of Fortune
reactions.desc: In response to another creature dealing damage to the nilbog, the nilbog reduces the damage to 0 and regains {@dice 1d6} hit points.

spells: The nilbog's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: mage hand, Tasha's hideous laughter, vicious mockery

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.desc: Nimira has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Nimira has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Multiattack. Nimira makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, or 16 (4d6 + 2) slashing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, Nimira magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Nimira is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Nimira lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Nimira magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment Nimira wears or carries is invisible with it.

monsters.name: Nintra Siotta

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Nintra fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Nintra makes two attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d4 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shard of Shadow
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 10 (1d6 + 7) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Storm of Shattered Glass {@recharge}
actions.desc: Nintra targets a point she can see within 60 feet of her and creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of swirling glass shards centered on that point. Each creature in the sphere must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save. If Nintra is in the sphere, the shards deal no damage to her.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Nintra makes one attack.

legendary_actions.name: Fey Step
legendary_actions.desc: Nintra teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her.

legendary_actions.name: Shadow Strikes (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Provided she is in bright or dim light, Nintra causes her shadow to attack a creature within 10 feet of her. Her shadow makes two claw attacks, each attack identical to Nintra's claw attack except that it deals psychic damage instead of piercing damage.

spells: Nintra casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (save {@dc 20}) and requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): dispel magic, faerie fire, mirror image

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: Noska has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of Noska's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Noska has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

traits.name: Difficult Climber
traits.desc: Noska has disadvantage on Strength checks made to climb, due to his disability.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Noska makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The nundro rockseeker has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Cloud of Vermin
traits.desc: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hunger-Driven
traits.desc: In the Nine Hells, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.desc: Oak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

actions.name: Hooked Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Return the Favor (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When Oak takes damage from a melee weapon attack, he can make a hooked dagger attack.

monsters.name: Oaken Bolter
monsters.damage_immunities: poison,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The oaken bolter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oaken bolter makes two lancing bolt attacks or one lancing bolt attack and one harpoon attack.

actions.name: Lancing Bolt
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 100/400 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 50/200 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 12). While grappled in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the oaken bolter. A creature takes 5 (1d10) slashing damage if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. As a bonus action, the oaken bolter can pull a creature grappled by it 20 feet closer. The oaken bolter can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Explosive Bolt {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The oaken bolter launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Obaya Uday

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Obaya can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Obaya expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

spells: Obaya is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Obaya has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, guiding bolt, sanctuary

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The oblex can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Aversion to Fire
traits.desc: If the oblex takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: Obliteros has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: Obliteros can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Obmi
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil
monsters.languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages, Dwarvish

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: During its first turn, Obmi has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Obmi scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If Obmi is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Obmi instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Obmi deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Obmi that isn't incapacitated and Obmi doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The obmi has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Obmi makes three shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The ogre deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Bash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the ogre can push the target 5 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.

actions.name: Block the Path
actions.desc: Until the start of the ogre's next turn, attack rolls against the ogre have disadvantage, it has advantage on the attack roll it makes for an opportunity attack, and that attack deals an extra 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage on a hit. Also, each enemy that tries to move out of the ogre's reach without teleporting must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the ogre's next turn.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bolt Launcher
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 17 (3d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chain Sweep
actions.desc: The ogre swings its chain, and every creature within 10 feet of it must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw.
