On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

actions.name: Chain Smash {@recharge}
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure the target is unconscious for 1 minute. The unconscious target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Howdah
traits.desc: The ogre carries a compact fort on its back. Up to four Small creatures can ride in the fort without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the ogre, they must use spears or weapons with reach. Creatures in the fort have three-quarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the ogre dies, creatures in the fort are placed in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of the ogre.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Oinoloth

traits.name: Bringer of Plagues {@recharge 5}
traits.desc:
As a bonus action, the oinoloth blights the area within 30 feet of it. The blight lasts for 24 hours. While blighted, all normal plants in the area wither and die, and the number of hit points restored by a spell to a creature in that area is halved.
Furthermore, when a creature moves into the blighted area or starts its turn there, that creature must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the oinoloth's Bringer of Plagues for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and is poisoned.
The poisoned creature can't regain hit points. After every 24 hours that elapse, the poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's hit point maximum is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). This reduction lasts until the poison ends, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. The poison ends after the creature successfully saves against it three times.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The oinoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The oinoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oinoloth uses its Transfixing Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 22 (4d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Corrupted Healing {@recharge}
actions.desc: The oinoloth touches one willing creature within 5 feet of it. The target regains all its hit points. In addition, the oinoloth can end one disease on the target or remove one of the following conditions from it: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned. The target then gains 1 level of exhaustion, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 7 ({@dice 2d6}). This reduction can be removed only by a wish spell or by casting greater restoration on the target three times within the same hour. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The oinoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Transfixing Gaze
actions.desc: The oinoloth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the oinoloth's next turn. While charmed in this way, the target is restrained. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the oinoloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

spells: The oinoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: darkness, detect magic, dispel magic, invisibility (self only)

spells.Daily (1e): feeblemind, globe of invulnerability, wall of fire, wall of ice

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Old Croaker can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: Old Croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) poison damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Old Croaker can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
Old Croaker makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Old Croaker, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of Old Croaker's turns. Old Croaker can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If Old Croaker dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monsters.name: Omin Dran

traits.name: Divine Strike
traits.desc: Once on each of his turns when he hits a creature with a weapon attack, Omin can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage of the same type dealt by the weapon.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Omin makes two attacks with his maul.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: War God's Blessing (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When a creature within 30 feet of Omin makes an attack roll, but before learning whether it hits or misses, Omin can grant the creature a +10 bonus to that roll.

spells: Omin is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): bless, command, divine favor, shield of faith

spells.2nd level (3 slots): enhance ability, hold person, magic weapon, silence, spiritual weapon

spells.3rd level (3 slots): beacon of hope, crusader's mantle, dispel magic, mass healing word, spirit guardians

spells.4th level (3 slots): death ward, freedom of movement, locate creature, stoneskin

spells.5th level (1 slots): dispel evil and good, flame strike, hold monster, greater restoration, legend lore

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dracolich's choice that is within 120 feet of the dracolich and aware of it must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dracolich exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dracolich can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.name: Orcus

traits.name: Wand of Orcus
traits.desc:
The wand has 7 charges, and any of its properties that require a saving throw have a save DC of 18. While holding it, Orcus can use an action to cast animate dead, blight, or speak with dead. Alternatively, he can expend 1 or more of the wand's charges to cast one of the following spells from it: circle of death (1 charge), finger of death (1 charge), or power word kill (2 charges). The wand regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} charges daily at dawn.
While holding the wand, Orcus can use an action to conjure undead creatures whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500. These undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action. Once this property of the wand is used, the property can't be used again until the next dawn.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Orcus fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Orcus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Orcus's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Master of Undeath
traits.desc: When Orcus casts animate dead or create undead, he chooses the level at which the spell is cast, and the creatures created by the spells remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast create undead even when it isn't night.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Orcus makes two Wand of Orcus attacks.

actions.name: Wand of Orcus
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

legendary_actions.name: Tail
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus makes one tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: A Taste of Undeath
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus casts chill touch (17th level).

legendary_actions.name: Creeping Death (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area have vulnerability to necrotic damage.

spells: Orcus's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 23}, {@hit 15} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): create undead, dispel magic

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Orond adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Orond must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

traits.name: Invisibility Field
traits.desc: The orthon can use a bonus action to become invisible. Any equipment the orthon wears or carries is also invisible as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after the orthon makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Infernal Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d4 + 6) slashing damage, and the target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target is poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Brass Crossbow
actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:
[object Object]

reactions.name: Explosive Retribution
reactions.desc: When it is reduced to 15 hit points or fewer, the orthon causes itself to explode. All other creatures within 30 feet of it must each make a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage plus 9 (2d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This explosion destroys the orthon, its infernal dagger, and its brass crossbow.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede Osvaldo's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Osvaldo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Osvaldo makes two attacks with its chains.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape 14) if Osvaldo isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
Up to four chains Osvaldo can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under Osvaldo's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.
Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When Osvaldo uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if Osvaldo is incapacitated or dies.

reactions.name: Unnerving Mask
reactions.desc: When a creature Osvaldo can see starts its turn within 30 feet of Osvaldo, Osvaldo can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see Osvaldo, it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Ott has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Otto
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: The Colors of Age
traits.desc:
A faerie dragon's scales change hue as it ages, moving through all the colors of the rainbow. All faerie dragons have innate spellcasting ability, gaining new spells as they mature.
Red—5 years or less
Orange—6–10 years
Yellow—11–20 years
Green—21–30 years
Blue—31–40 years
Indigo—41–50 years
Violet—51 years or more
A green or older faerie dragon's CR increases to 2.

traits.name: Superior Invisibility
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the dragon can magically turn invisible until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the dragon wears or carries is invisible with it.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.desc: Using telepathy, the dragon can magically communicate with any other faerie dragon within 60 feet of it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The faerie dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2d6 + 4 piercing damage.

actions.name: Euphoria Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The dragon exhales a puff of euphoria gas at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw, or for 1 minute, the target can't take reactions and must roll a {@dice d6} at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior during the turn:
1–4. The target takes no action or bonus action and uses all of its movement to move in a random direction.
5–6. The target doesn't move, and the only thing it can do on its turn is make a 11 Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It can innately cast a number of spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): color spray, dancing lights, hallucinatory terrain, mage hand, major image, minor illusion, mirror image, polymorph, suggestion

monsters.name: Oussa

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: Oussa can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Oussa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Malison Type
traits.desc:
Oussa has one of the following types:
[object Object]

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Oussa makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can constrict only once.

actions.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Oussa can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Oussa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). Oussa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.desc: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Parson Pellinost

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Pellinost can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Pellinost expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each level above 1st.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

spells: Pellinost is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Pellinost has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, spare the dying

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, guiding bolt

monsters.name: Pendragon Beestinger

traits.name: Echo Spell (1/Day)
traits.desc: Pendragon can cast the spell he cast on his last turn, whose casting time becomes 1 bonus action. This bonus casting uses a spell slot as normal.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Pendragon is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mage hand, poison spray, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, sleep

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, cloud of daggers, scorching ray

monsters.name: Phaia

traits.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
traits.desc: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, Phaia regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (2d4) necrotic damage.

spells: Phaia is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). Phaia has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, dancing lights, mage hand, mending

spells.1st level (4 slots): false life*, mage armor, ray of sickness*

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead*, bestow curse*, vampiric touch*

monsters.name: Phoenix
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
traits.desc:
When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 60-feet of it must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.
The explosion destroys the phoenix's body and leaves behind an egg-shaped cinder that weighs 5 pounds. The cinder is blazing hot, dealing 21 (6d6) fire damage to any creature that touches it, though no more than once per round. The cinder is immune to all damage, and after {@dice 1d6} days, it hatches a new phoenix.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.desc: The phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. With a touch, the phoenix can also ignite flammable objects that aren't worn or carried (no action required).

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The phoenix doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The phoenix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the phoenix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The phoenix deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The phoenix makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its fiery talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Fiery Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Peck
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix makes one beak attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix moves up to its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Swoop (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The phoenix moves up to its speed and attacks with its fiery talons.

monsters.name: Phoenix Anvil

traits.name: Divine Display (1/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Phoenix causes his shield to flare with divine light. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Phoenix makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet.

spells: Phoenix is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, mending, sacred flame

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, cure wounds, guiding bolt

monsters.name: Play-by-Play Generator
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: the generator can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the generator dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The generator makes two fist attacks or four dart attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Magic Dart
actions.desc: The generator hurls a magic dart at a target it can see up to 60 feet away from it. The dart hits its target automatically (no attack roll required) for 5 (2d4) force damage.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Portentia deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Portentia that isn't incapacitated and Portentia doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Portentia makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: Portentia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (her choice). In a new form, Portentia retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks.

monsters.name: Portia Dzuth
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Portia rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Portia can regain 20 hit points.

traits.name: Shadowfell Despair
traits.desc: Portia suffers from Shadowfell despair manifesting as unshakable dread. Until the despair ends, she has disadvantage on all saving throws and gains the following flaw: "I'm convinced that I'm going to die in Vanrakdoom." Portia can attempt to end her despair each time she finishes a long rest, doing so with a successful DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. A calm emotions spell also ends her despair, as does any spell or other magical effect that removes a curse.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Portia makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if Portia has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Portia has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

monsters.name: Preeta Kreepa
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Eye Rays
reactions.desc:
As a bonus action or a reaction, Preeta can shoot one of the following eye rays at one target she can see within 120 feet of her:
[object Object]

spells: Preeta is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Preeta has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Prisoner 237
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

spells: Prisoner 237 is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}; {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light*, message*, prestidigitation, shocking grasp (see "Actions" below)

spells.1st level (4 slots): mage armor*, shield, sleep

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.desc: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blurred Movement
traits.desc: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Rabbithead
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Raegrin Mau
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Raegrin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The raegrin mau has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the raegrin mau to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.desc: The raegrin mau can attempt to {@action hide} even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Ram Sugar

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: Ram Sugar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Ram Sugar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Ram Sugar exhales fire in a 30-foot-long line that is 5 feet wide. Any creature in the line must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: Ram Sugar is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). Ram Sugar has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The abishai can use its Frightful Presence. It also makes three attacks: one with its morningstar, one with its claw, and one with its bite.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 38 (7d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the abishai's choice that is within 120 feet and aware of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the abishai's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Incite Fanaticism
actions.desc: The abishai chooses up to four of its allies within 60 feet of it that can see it. For 1 minute, each of those allies makes attack rolls with advantage and can't be frightened.

actions.name: Power of the Dragon Queen
actions.desc: The abishai targets one dragon it can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon must make a 18 Charisma saving throw. A chromatic dragon makes this save with disadvantage. On a successful save, the target is immune to the abishai's Power of the Dragon Queen for 1 hour. On a failed save, the target is charmed by the abishai for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, the target regards the abishai as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. This effect ends if the abishai or its companions deal damage to the target.

monsters.name: Red Guard Drake
monsters.languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Iron Boots
traits.desc: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

traits.name: Outsize Strength
traits.desc: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

actions.name: Wicked Sickle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Ironbound Pursuit
actions.desc: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Remallia Haventree

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Remallia has a {@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Silver Raven||figurine of wondrous power (silver raven)}.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Remallia has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Arcane Ward
traits.desc: Remallia has a magical ward that has 30 hit points. Whenever she takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, Remallia takes any remaining damage. When Remallia casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. This applies to any of the following spells she casts: alarm. mage armor, shield, arcane lock, counterspell, dispel magic, banishment, stoneskin, globe of invulnerability and symbol

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Remallia is a 13th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, mage hand, mending, message, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): alarm, mage armor, magic missile, shield

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, wall of force

spells.6th level (1 slots): flesh to stone, globe of invulnerability

traits.name: Lightfooted
traits.desc: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.desc: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Retriever
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Elvish, and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Faultless Tracker
traits.desc: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks and uses its force or paralyzing beam once, if available.

actions.name: Foreleg
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Force Beam
actions.desc: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Paralyzing Beam {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The paralyzed target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
If the paralyzed creature is Medium or smaller, the retriever can pick it up as part of the retriever's move and walk or climb with it at full speed.

spells: The retriever's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The retriever can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

spells.Daily (3e): plane shift (only self and up to one incapacitated creature which is considered willing for the spell), web

monsters.name: Rishaal the Page-Turner

actions.name: Breath Weapon
actions.desc: Rishaal can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire (but can't do this again until he finishes a short or long rest); each creature in the cone must make a 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking {@dice 2d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Rishaal is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence. Rishaal has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Rosie Beestinger

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: Rosie can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If Rosie is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

traits.name: Shadow Step
traits.desc: When Rosie is in dim light or darkness, she can use a bonus action to teleport 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rosie makes three attacks, then makes two unarmed strike attacks.

actions.name: Staff of the Master (+1 Quarterstaff)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Rosie's unarmed strikes are magical.

reactions.name: Deflect Missiles
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Rosie deflects the missile. The damage she takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 9}. If the damage is reduced to 0, she catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and she has a hand free.

spells: Rosie's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): command, darkness, darkvision, pass without trace, silence

traits.name: Rancid Degeneration
traits.desc: At the end of each of the troll's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Crippling Fear
traits.desc: When a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet of three or more rutterkins, it must make a 11 Wisdom saving throw. The creature has disadvantage on the save if it's within 30 feet of six or more rutterkins. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the Crippling Fear of all rutterkins for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. While frightened in this way, the creature is restrained. At the end of each of the frightened creature's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned. At the end of each long rest, the poisoned target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points while poisoned in this way, it dies and instantly transforms into a living {@creature abyssal wretch|mtf}. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell. (See notes)

monsters.name: Sacred Statue
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: the languages the eidolon knew in life

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Ghostly Inhabitant
traits.desc: The {@creature eidolon|MTF} that enters the sacred statue remains inside it until the statue drops to 0 hit points, the eidolon uses a bonus action to move out of the statue, or the eidolon is turned or forced out by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the eidolon leaves the statue, it appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the statue.

traits.name: Inert
traits.desc: When not inhabited by an {@creature eidolon|MTF}, the statue is an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 43 (6d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 37 (6d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Saeth makes two longsword attacks. If he has a shortsword drawn, he can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of its turns, Samara can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: Samara deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Samara that isn't incapacitated and Samara doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: The samara strongbones can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The samara strongbones has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Samara makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Sea Spawn
monsters.languages: understands Aquan and Common but can't speak

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.desc: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sea spawn makes three attacks: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Piscine Anatomy
actions.desc:
The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:
[object Object]

monsters.name: Sephek Kaltro
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Cold Regeneration
traits.desc: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek regains 5 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sephek attacks twice with a weapon.

actions.name: Ice Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Dagger
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

spells: Sephek can innately cast {@spell misty step} up to three times per day, requiring no components. His innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The shadow dancer has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Shadow Jump
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the shadow dancer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The shadow dancer can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadow dancer makes three spiked chain attacks.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or suffer one additional effect of the shadow dancer's choice:
[object Object]

traits.name: Ethereal Awareness
traits.desc: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Shadow Blend
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.desc: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The shalendra floshin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put The shalendra floshin to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Sharwyn Hucrele

traits.name: Barkskin
traits.desc: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Sharwyn has a {@item spellbook|phb} that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

traits.name: Tree Thrall
traits.desc: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Sharwyn is a 1st-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (2 slots): color spray, magic missile, shield, sleep

monsters.name: Shemshime
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, fire, lightning, piercing, slashing, thunder
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Crushing End
traits.desc: If damage reduces Shemshime to 0 hit points, Shemshime instead drops to 1 hit point unless the damage is the result of Shemshime being crushed by an object weighing at least 1,000 pounds.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: Shemshime can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Whispers of Violence
actions.desc: Shemshime chooses up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw, or that target takes 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature it can reach (Shemshime's choice) that Shemshime can see.

actions.name: Howling Babble {@recharge}
actions.desc: Shemshime targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage and is stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

monsters.name: Shockerstomper
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned

traits.name: Disable
traits.desc: When a leg drops to 0 hit points, it is disabled, and Shockerstomper can use a reaction to detach it from its main body. Whenever one of its legs is disabled, Shockerstomper's walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. The whole contraption topples over and shuts down if four of its seven legs are disabled.

traits.name: Electrified Surface
traits.desc: A creature that ends its turn in contact with Shockerstomper's body (saucer or turrets) must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: Shockerstomper is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Control Module
traits.desc: A creature atop or above Shockerstomper's platform can locate its control module with a successful 15 Intelligence (Investigation) check or Wisdom (Perception) check. As an action, a character can try to open the control module's access panel, either by tearing it off with a successful 25 Strength (Athletics) check or by dislodging it with thieves' tools and a successful 25 Dexterity check. Behind the panel, embedded in the floor of the control module, is a 5-foot-diameter pulsating crystal hemisphere with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. Destroying the crystal hemisphere shuts down Shockerstomper.

traits.name: Lightning Turret
traits.desc: A character can try to plug the nozzle of a lightning turret with a 10-pound rock or similar object, doing so with a successful 15 Strength (Athletics) check. A plugged turret can't shoot lightning until a creature uses an action to try to clear the obstruction, which requires another successful 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. Shockerstomper has no ability to clear an obstruction itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Shockerstomper makes three Lightning Turret attacks and two Stomp attacks.

actions.name: Lightning Turret
actions.desc: The turret shoots a magical lightning bolt at one creature within 60 feet of Shockerstomper. The target must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shoosuva makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Shunn Shurreth
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Spider Features
traits.desc: While cursed with spider features, Shunn can climb difficult surfaces, even across ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Shunn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Shunn to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Shunn has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Shunn makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Shunn adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Shunn must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spells: Shunn's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Sibriex

traits.name: Contamination
traits.desc: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Plants that aren't creatures wither in the aura, and the ground in it is difficult terrain for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the sibriex fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The sibriex has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile once and makes three attacks using its chain, bite, or both.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d12 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Squirt Bile
actions.desc: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 35 (10d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Warp Creature
actions.desc: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a creature becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. On a failed save, the target is poisoned, which causes it to also gain 1 level of exhaustion. While poisoned in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of exhaustion caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to suffer another level of exhaustion. Once the target reaches 6 levels of exhaustion, it dies and instantly transforms into a living {@creature abyssal wretch|mtf} under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a wish spell.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex casts a spell.

legendary_actions.name: Spray Bile
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary_actions.name: Warp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

spells: The sibriex's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, command, dispel magic, hold monster

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sildar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: When an attacker hits Sildar with a melee attack and Sildar can see the attacker, he can roll {@dice 1d6} and add the number rolled to his AC against the triggering attack, provided that he's wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Sing-Along
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.desc: The sing-along can move through a space of a Medium or larger creature.

traits.name: Brave
traits.desc: The sing-along has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Barkskin
traits.desc: Sir Braford's AC can't be lower than 16.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Sir Braford wields {@item Shatterspike|tftyp}, a magic longsword that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it (included in his attack). See the Shatterspike handout for the item's other properties.

traits.name: Tree Thrall
traits.desc: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sir Braford dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

reactions.name: Protection
reactions.desc: When a creature Sir Braford can see attacks a target other than him that is within 5 feet of him, he can use a reaction to use his shield to impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

monsters.name: Siren

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Siren can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stupefying Touch
actions.desc: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (3d6 + 3) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of Siren's next turn.

spells: Siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): charm person, fog cloud, greater invisibility, polymorph (self only)

monsters.name: Skeemo Weirdbottle

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: Skeemo has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: Skeemo is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks) He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

traits.name: Powerful Build
traits.desc: Sken counts as one size larger when determining her carrying capacity and the weight she can push, drag, or lift.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: Sken wears a ring of obscuring. With it, she can cast the fog cloud spell centered on herself three times per day. The cloud lasts for 1 minute (no concentration required).

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

reactions.name: Stone's Endurance (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reactions.desc: When Sken takes damage, she can use her reaction to reduce the damage taken by 8 ({@dice 1d12 + 2}).

monsters.name: Skr'a S'orsk

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack (Lizardfolk Form Only)
actions.desc: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage in {@creature crocodile} form. If Skr'a S'orsk is in crocodile form and the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and Skr'a S'orsk can't bite another target. If Skr'a S'orsk reverts to its true form, the grapple ends.

actions.name: Claws (Lizardfolk Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The lizardfolk magically polymorphs into a {@creature crocodile}, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

spells: Skr'a S'orsk is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). Skr'a S'orsk has the following druid spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): produce flame, resistance, thorn whip

spells.1st level (4 slots): entangle, fog cloud

traits.name: Fallible Invisibility
traits.desc:
The skulk is invisible. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:
[object Object]

traits.name: Trackless
traits.desc: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the skulk has advantage on the attack roll, the target also takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Skull Lord
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, stunned, unconscious
monsters.languages: all the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the skull lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master of the Grave
traits.desc: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains {@dice 1d6} hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The skull lord makes three bone staff attacks.

actions.name: Bone Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Bone Staff (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord makes a bone staff attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The skull lord moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Undead (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Up to five {@creature skeleton||skeletons} or {@creature zombie||zombies} appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the skull lord and remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative and act in the next available turn. The skull lord can have up to five undead summoned by this ability at a time.

spells: The skull lord is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The skull lord knows the following sorcerer spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch, fire bolt, mage hand, poison spray, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): magic missile, expeditious retreat, thunderwave

monsters.name: Slithering Tracker
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form but can't speak

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.desc: In the first round of a combat, the slithering tracker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.desc: While grappling a creature, the slithering tracker takes only haIf the damage dealt to it, and the creature it is grappling takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the slithering tracker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a puddle, unless an observer succeeds on a 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check.

traits.name: Keen Tracker
traits.desc: The slithering tracker has advantage on Wisdom checks to track prey.

traits.name: Liquid Form
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Watery Stealth
traits.desc: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.desc: One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the grappled target takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.

monsters.name: Snarla
monsters.damage_immunities: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spells: Snarla is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): magic missile, shield, thunderwave

spells.3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, fear, haste, stinking cloud

monsters.name: Snurrevin

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.desc: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

spells: Snurrevin is a 3rd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): color spray, shield, silent image

monsters.name: Soluun Xibrindas

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Soluun has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Soluun to sleep.

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.desc: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on Soluun's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, Soluun ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, Soluun has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Equipment
traits.desc: Four packets of smokepowder and a pouch containing 20 pistol bullets

traits.name: Boots of Elvenkind
traits.desc: Whilst wearing these boots Soluun's steps make no sound and he has advantage on any Dexterity (Stealth) checks that rely on moving silently.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Soluun makes two scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

spells: Soluun's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Soul Monger

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The soul monger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Thirst
traits.desc: When the soul monger reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul monger can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's hit point maximum. While the soul monger has temporary hit points from this ability, it has advantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Weight of Ages
traits.desc: Any beast or humanoid, other than a shadar-kai, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the soul monger has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soul monger makes two phantasmal dagger attacks.

actions.name: Phantasmal Dagger
