actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (4d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 19 (3d12) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the start of the soul monger's next turn.

actions.name: Wave of Weariness {@recharge 4}
actions.desc: The soul monger emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage and suffers 1 level of exhaustion. On a successful save, it takes 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

spells: The soul monger's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (1e): bestow curse, chain lightning, finger of death, gaseous form, phantasmal killer, seeming

monsters.name: Spawn of Kyuss
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Worms
traits.desc: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spawn of Kyuss makes two attacks with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm.

actions.name: Burrowing Worm
actions.desc: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of {@dice 10d6}). A worm-infested target dies if it drops to 0 hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Spellix Romwod
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.desc: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

spells: Spellix's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: fire bolt*, mage hand, shocking grasp*

spells.Daily (1e): chromatic orb, crown of madness, shield

monsters.name: Spirit Troll
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The troll can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 19 (3d10 + 3) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Spring Eladrin

traits.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Joyful Presence
traits.desc:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

spells: The eladrin's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): confusion, enthrall, suggestion

monsters.name: Stalagma Steelshadow
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.
[object Object]

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).
In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 22 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

traits.name: Aura of Madness
traits.desc: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

actions.name: Confounding Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Wisdom saving throw or attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

traits.name: Psychic Mirror
traits.desc: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hulk makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Reaping Arms {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The hulk makes a separate slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Star Spawn Larva Mage
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained

traits.name: Return to Worms
traits.desc: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a {@creature swarm of insects} in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Plague of Worms {@recharge}
actions.desc: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the larva mage must make a 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure the target takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage and is blinded and restrained by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 (5d8) necrotic damage at the start of each of the larva mage's turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

reactions.name: Feed on Weakness
reactions.desc: When a creature within 20 feet of the larva mage fails a saving throw, the larva mage gains 10 temporary hit points.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The larva mage casts one cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The larva mage makes one slam attack.

legendary_actions.name: Feed (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature restrained by the larva mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the larva mage gains 6 temporary hit points.

spells: The larva mage's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Ambush
traits.desc: On the first round of each combat, the mangler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the mangler can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mangler makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Flurry of Claws {@recharge 4}
actions.desc: The mangler makes six claw attacks against one target. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed as a bonus action without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
traits.desc: The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The seer makes two comet staff attacks or uses Psychic Orb twice.

actions.name: Comet Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) psychic damage, if used with two hands, and the target must succeed on a 19 Constitution saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Orb
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +11 to hit, range 120 feet, one target. 27 (5d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Collapse Distance {@recharge}
actions.desc: The seer warps space around a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature must make a 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is magically teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and all other creatures within 10 feet of the target's original space each takes 39 (6d12) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes 19 (3d12) psychic damage.

reactions.name: Bend Space
reactions.desc: When the seer would be hit by an attack, it teleports, exchanging positions with another star spawn it can see within 60 feet of it. The other star spawn is hit by the attack instead.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While Steel Crane is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Steel Crane makes three attacks.

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of Steel Crane's next turn.

actions.name: Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage or, if the target is a creature, Steel Crane can grapple the target instead (escape 15). Steel Crane can't make attacks with the whip while using it to grapple a creature. Anytime on his turn, he can release a creature grappled by the whip (no action required).

actions.name: Heal Self (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Steel Crane regains {@dice 2d8 + 4} hit points, and all levels of exhaustion end on him.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, Steel Crane deflects the missile. The damage he takes from the attack is reduced by {@dice 1d10 + 10}. If the damage is reduced to 0, Steel Crane catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and Steel Crane has a hand free.

reactions.name: Slow Descent (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When Steel Crane falls, he can slow his descent, taking no damage from the fall.

monsters.name: Steel Predator
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
monsters.languages: understands Modron and the language of its owner but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The steel predator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The steel predator's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The steel predator makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claw.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Roar {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The steel predator emits a roar in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 19 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (5d10) thunder damage, drops everything it's holding, and is stunned for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The steel predator's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The steel predator can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (3e): dimension door (self only), plane shift (self only)

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Stone Cursed
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Cunning Opportunist
traits.desc: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone cursed remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

actions.name: Petrifying Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw, or it begins to turn to stone and is restrained until the end of its next turn, when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is petrified for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Stone Defender
monsters.damage_immunities: poison,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the stone defender remains motionless against an uneven earthen or stone surface, it is indistinguishable from that surface.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The stone defender has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked prone.

reactions.name: Intercept Attack
reactions.desc: In response to another creature within 5 feet of it being hit by an attack roll, the stone defender gives that creature a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack, potentially causing a miss. To use this ability, the stone defender must be able to see the creature and the attacker.

traits.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
traits.desc: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the giant. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two attacks with its greatclub.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Touch
actions.desc: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is charmed by it. The target must make a 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes petrified, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. Greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a petrified creature on the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the petrified creature as well as ending the petrified condition on it.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind Javelin twice.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

actions.name: Windjavelin
actions.desc: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary_actions.name: Gust
legendary_actions.desc: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary_actions.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

traits.name: Fearsome Presence
traits.desc: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Fey Step {@recharge 4}
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) fire damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Sundeth
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Sundeth rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Sundeth can regain 20 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sundeth makes three attacks with its greatsword or its shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage, plus 7 (2d6) slashing damage if Sundeth has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 7 (2d6) piercing damage if Sundeth has more than half of its total hit points remaining.

monsters.name: Swarm of Cranium Rats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.desc: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

spells: The swarm's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}). As long as it has more than half of its hit points, it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Swarm of Rot Grubs
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. The target is infested by {@dice 1d4} rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@dice 1d6} piercing damage per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned. If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

monsters.name: Swashbuckler
monsters.alignment: neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic good neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Lightfooted
traits.desc: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.desc: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Commander
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Martial Fury
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Turning Defiance
traits.desc: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Call to Honor (1/Day)
actions.desc: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls until the end of its next turn, and {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@creature sword wraith warrior|mtf|sword wraith warriors} appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

monsters.name: Sword Wraith Warrior

traits.name: Martial Fury

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.desc: Sylgar can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: Tally has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Aggressive

traits.desc: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Unbridled Fury
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the tanarukk can make one melee weapon attack with advantage against the attacker.

monsters.name: Tarul Var

traits.name: Focused Conjuration
traits.desc: While Var is concentrating on a conjuration spell, his concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Var fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If Var is destroyed but his phylactery remains intact, Var gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: Var has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Benign Transposition
actions.desc: Var teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Alternatively, he can choose a space within range that is occupied by a Small or Medium creature. If that creature is willing, both creatures teleport, swapping places. Var can use this feature again only after he finishes a long rest or casts a conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Var casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Var uses Paralyzing Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Var fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Var's gaze for the next 24 hours.

spells:
Var is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
*Conjuration spell of 1st level or higher

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, unseen servant*

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, flaming sphere*, mirror image, scorching ray

spells.5th level (3 slots): cloudkill*, scrying

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.desc: Tashlyn can reroll a saving throw that she fails. She must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Tashlyn can regain 20 hit points.

traits.name: Extra Damage
traits.desc: Tashlyn deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to every hit if she has more than half her hit points remaining.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Tashlyn makes three attacks with her greatsword or her shortbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Glowing
traits.desc: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

traits.name: Flexible
traits.desc: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.desc: Tecuziztecatl makes two pseudopod attacks.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.desc: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.desc: The Angry has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Rising Anger
traits.desc:
If another creature deals damage to the Angry, the Angry's attack rolls have advantage until the end of its next turn, and the first time it hits with a hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 (3d12) psychic damage.
On its turn, the Angry has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Angry makes two hook attacks.

actions.name: Hook
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Life Hunger
traits.desc: If a creature the Hungry can see regains hit points, the Hungry gains two benefits until the end of its next turn: it has advantage on attack rolls, and its bite deals an extra 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Hungry makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 16) and is restrained until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the Hungry can't attack with its claws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Keeper makes two battleaxe attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe +2
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) slashing damage, or 23 (3d10 + 7) slashing damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Rock Catching
reactions.desc: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the Keeper, the Keeper can, with a successful 10 Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

traits.name: Psychic Leech
traits.desc: At the start of each of the Lonely's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

traits.name: Thrives on Company
traits.desc: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lonely makes one harpoon arm attack and uses Sorrowful Embrace.

actions.name: Harpoon Arm
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15) if it is a Large or smaller creature.
The Lonely has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

actions.name: Sorrowful Embrace
actions.desc: Each creature grappled by the Lonely must make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. A creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In either case, the Lonely pulls each creature grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lost makes two arm spike attacks.

actions.name: Arm Spike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Embrace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is frightened, and it takes 27 (6d8) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns. The Lost can embrace only one creature at a time.

reactions.name: Tightening Embrace
reactions.desc: If the Lost takes damage while it has a creature grappled, that creature takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage.

traits.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The Wretched has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Wretched's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage, and the Wretched attaches to the target. While attached, the Wretched can't attack, and at the start of each of the Wretched's turns, the target takes 6 (1d10 + 1) necrotic damage.
The attached Wretched moves with the target whenever the target moves, requiring none of the Wretched's movement. The Wretched can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement on its turn. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach a Wretched.

monsters.name: Therzt

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.desc: The therzt has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the therzt to sleep.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the therzt has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The therzt's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). The therzt can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.desc: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Thorny Body
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the thorny deals 2 (1d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: Thorvin has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance to poison damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of his turn, Thrakkus can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapon (1/Day)
actions.desc: Thrakkus can use his action to exhale a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in the cone must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Feline Agility
traits.desc: When The three earrings moves on its turn in combat, they can double their speed until the end of the turn. Once they uses this ability, The three earrings can't use it again until they moves 0 feet on one of their turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or Three Earrings makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hit +4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 +2) slashing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Three Earrings must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Thwad Underbrew

traits.desc: Thwad rerolls a failed saving throw.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.desc: The thwad underbrew has advantage on saving throws against poison, and has resistance against poison damage.
