traits.desc: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 15-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Black Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Chromatic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 425 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 105,000 XP (210,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Chromatic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales a blast of energy in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 78 (12d12) acid damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Arcane Spear (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm creates four spears of magical force. Each spear hits a creature of the greatwyrm's choice it can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 12 (1d8 + 8) force damage to its target, then disappears.

monsters.name: Black Pudding
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.desc: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) acid damage. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

reactions.name: Split
reactions.desc: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 hit points. Each new pudding has hit points equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

monsters.name: Blink Dog
monsters.languages: Blink Dog, understands Sylvan but can't speak it

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The dog has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
actions.desc: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hawk's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Blood Hunter

traits.name: Blood Curse of Binding (1/Day)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the blood hunter targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 and be unable to take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The blood hunter has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The blood hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The blood hunter attacks twice with a weapon.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The blood hunter can innately cast {@spell hex}. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a {@creature red slaad} or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a {@creature green slaad}. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the boar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Tusk
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Bone Naga (Guardian)

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mending, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, shield of faith

monsters.name: Bone Naga (Spirit)

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

spells: The naga is a 5th-level spellcaster (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, sleep

monsters.name: Booyahg Booyahg Booyahg

traits.name: Wild Magic
traits.desc: Each time the goblin casts a spell (including cantrips), there is an accompanying surge of wild magic; roll on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} to determine the wild magic effect.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The goblin is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The goblin has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield

monsters.name: Booyahg Caster

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The goblin can cast a randomly determined {@filter 1st-level wizard spell|spells|level=1|class=wizard} once per day. Intelligence is its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 10}, {@hit 2} to hit with spell attacks).

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Khurgorbaeyag's Gift
traits.desc: Khurgorbaeyag saw fit to gift this goblin with powers that enable it to dominate others. The goblin has {@dice 1d3} other {@creature goblin||goblins} that slavishly obey its orders.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The goblin found a magic item (a {@item necklace of fireballs}, a {@item circlet of blasting}, or the like) and learned how to use it.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Bore Worm
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: fire, poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The worm regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The worm makes two attacks: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.

actions.name: Grinding Jaws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage, and the target must make a 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Brain in a Jar
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius); see also "detect sentience" below
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Detect Sentience
traits.desc: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The brain doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.

actions.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The brain magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: The brain's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: chill touch (see "Actions" below), detect thoughts, mage hand, zone of truth

spells.Daily (3e): charm person, hold person

spells.Daily (1e): compulsion, hold monster, sleep (3rd-level version), Tasha's hideous laughter

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.desc: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.desc: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The bullywug can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.desc: The bullywug can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.desc: The bullywug has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bullywug's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bullywug makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its spear.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Cambion

traits.name: Fiendish Blessing
traits.desc: The AC of the cambion includes its Charisma bonus.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cambion makes two melee attacks or uses its Fire Ray twice.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Ray
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fiendish Charm
actions.desc: One humanoid the cambion can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the cambion's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the cambion or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the cambion, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the cambion's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

spells: The cambion's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The cambion can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): alter self, command, detect magic

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Canopic Golem

traits.name: Limited Spell Immunity
traits.desc: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (4d10 + 5) force damage.

actions.name: Crystal Dart
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) force damage.

reactions.name: Spell Deflection
reactions.desc: In response to a spell attack missing the golem, it causes that spell to hit another creature within 120 feet of it that it can see.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The carrion crawler has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The carrion crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Carrion Ogre

traits.name: Tied Down
traits.desc: While lashed to the floor, the creature is prone and restrained. It also suffers from two levels of exhaustion.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The creature makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The cat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Celestial Spirit
monsters.languages: Celestial, understands the languages you speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points.

actions.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
actions.desc: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8 + summonSpellLevel}.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the centaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its pike and one with its hooves or two with its longbow.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the centaur mummy moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The centaur mummy makes two melee attacks, one with its pike and one with its hooves, or it attacks with its pike and uses Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.desc: The centaur mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, the target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two attacks with its chains.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. The target is grappled (escape 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 7 (2d6) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns.

actions.name: Animate Chains (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
Up to four chains the devil can see within 60 feet of it magically sprout razor-edged barbs and animate under the devil's control, provided that the chains aren't being worn or carried.
Each animated chain is an object with AC 20, 20 hit points, resistance to piercing damage, and immunity to psychic and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack on its turn, it can use each animated chain to make one additional chain attack. An animated chain can grapple one creature of its own but can't make attacks while grappling. An animated chain reverts to its inanimate state if reduced to 0 hit points or if the devil is incapacitated or dies.

reactions.name: Unnerving Mask
reactions.desc: When a creature the devil can see starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil, the devil can create the illusion that it looks like one of the creature's departed loved ones or bitter enemies. If the creature can see the devil, it must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The chaos quadrapod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

actions.name: Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Chardalyn Berserker
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Chardalyn Madness
traits.desc: The berserker must roll a {@dice d6} at the start of each of its turns. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.

actions.name: Chardalyn Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Chardalyn Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Chardalyn Dragon
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: the languages known by its creator

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wings
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Malevolent Presence
actions.desc: Any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Malevolent Presence for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the charmed creature can act normally on its turn.

actions.name: Radiant Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a ray of radiant energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Drone
traits.desc: The chasme produces a horrid droning sound to which demons are immune. Any other creature that starts its turn with in 30 feet of the chasme must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 10 minutes. A creature that can't hear the drone automatically succeeds on the save. The effect on the creature ends if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to splash it with holy water. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the drone for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The chasme has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The chasme can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Proboscis
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (4d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) necrotic damage, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. If this effect reduces a creature's hit point maximum to 0, the creature dies. This reduction to a creature's hit point maximum lasts until the creature finishes a long rest or until it is affected by a spell like  greater restoration.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chimera makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dragon head exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Chimeric Baboon
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage, plus an extra 3 (1d6) poison damage.

monsters.name: Chimeric Cat
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

monsters.name: Chimeric Fox

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation
traits.desc: The fox has fur that changes color to match its surroundings, giving it advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Chimeric Hare
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Escape
traits.desc: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

monsters.name: Chimeric Rat
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The rat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation
traits.desc: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Chimeric Weasel
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation
traits.desc: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Chuul
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The chuul can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.desc: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chuul makes two pincer attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its tentacles once.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: One creature grappled by the chuul must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Chwinga
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The chwinga doesn't require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Magical Gift (1/Day)
actions.desc: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a {@filter supernatural charm|rewards|type=charm} of the DM's choice. See {@book chapter 7|DMG|7|Other Rewards} of the Dungeon Masters Guide for more information on supernatural charms.

actions.name: Natural Shelter
actions.desc: The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living plant, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn't impair the chwinga's blindsight. The chwinga can use it's action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter's space, but is otherwise unharmed.

spells: The chwinga's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

spells.At will: druidcraft, guidance, pass without trace, resistance

monsters.name: Clay Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: acid, poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Acid Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

traits.name: Berserk
traits.desc: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 60 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the  greater restoration spell or other magic.

actions.name: Haste {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Until the end of its next turn, the golem magically gains a +2 bonus to its AC, has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and can use its slam attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.desc: While attached to a creature, the cloaker takes only half the damage dealt to it (rounded down). and that creature takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the cloaker remains motionless without its underside exposed, it is indistinguishable from a dark leather cloak.

traits.name: Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in bright light, the cloaker has disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cloaker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the cloaker attaches to it. If the cloaker has advantage against the target, the cloaker attaches to the target's head, and the target is blinded and unable to breathe while the cloaker is attached. While attached, the cloaker can make this attack only against the target and has advantage on the attack roll. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. A creature, including the target, can take its action to detach the cloaker by succeeding on a 16 Strength check.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Moan
actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of the cloaker that can hear its moan and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of the cloaker's next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the cloaker's moan for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Phantasms (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.
Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.
A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

monsters.name: Clockwork Dragon
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Cloud Giant

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis

monsters.name: Cloud Giant Ghost
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.desc: The ghost can see 120 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The ghost regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the ghost takes radiant damage or damage from a magic weapon, this trait doesn't function at the start of the ghost's next turn. The ghost dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ghost makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Spectral Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Wind Howl {@recharge}
actions.desc: The ghost emits a dreadful howl that summons a cold, biting wind. This wind engulfs up to three creatures of the ghost's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the ghost and must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The ghost casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability and requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Cloud Giant Noble

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two morningstar attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.Daily (3e): feather fall, fly, misty step, telekinesis

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw against being magically petrified. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

monsters.name: Coldlight Walker
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Blinding Light
traits.desc: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.

traits.name: Icy Doom
traits.desc: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The walker makes two attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Ray
actions.desc: {@atk rs} +3 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) cold damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

monsters.name: Construct Spirit
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
traits.desc: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d10 fire damage.

traits.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
traits.desc: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
reactions.desc: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The commoner doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. When it drops to 0 hit points, it becomes a lifeless object.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.desc:

monsters.name: Copper Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Metallic Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 450 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section for 1 hour. Award a party an additional 120,000 XP (240,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Metallic Awakening activates.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (2d8 + 10) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 20) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm uses one of the following breath weapons:
[object Object]

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The greatwyrm magically transforms into any creature that is Medium or Small, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the dragon is reduced to 0 hit points or uses its action to end it.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw or Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm beats its wings. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The greatwyrm can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.name: Core Spawn Crawler
monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), tremorsense 60 ft.
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of the crawler's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Core Spawn Emissary
monsters.languages: telepathy 120 ft., understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The emissary has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The emissary makes three talons attacks.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Alluring Thrum (Recharges 5-6)
actions.desc: The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Crystal Spores {@recharge}
actions.desc: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in the area must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 11 (2d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Core Spawn Seer
monsters.languages: Common, Deep Speech, telepathy 120 ft., Undercommon

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.desc: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The seer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The seer uses Fission Staff twice, Psychedelic Orb twice, or each one once.

actions.name: Fission Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is knocked prone.

actions.name: Psychedelic Orb
actions.desc: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target must succeed on a 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a {@dice d6} for the condition: (1-2) blinded, (3-4) frightened, or (5-6) stunned.

reactions.name: Fuse Damage
reactions.desc: When the seer is hit by an attack, it takes only half of the triggering damage. The first time the seer hits with a melee attack on its next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 radiant damage.

monsters.name: Core Spawn Worm
monsters.languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.

traits.name: Radiant Mirror
traits.desc: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The worm makes two attacks: one with its barbed tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Barbed Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 25 (5d6 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The tentacles can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.
If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The avatar makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 32 (8d6 + 4) necrotic damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be transformed into a wolf under the avatar's control. This transformation lasts for 1 hour, or until the target drops to 0 hit points or dies. The target's game statistics are replaced by the wolf's statistics, but it retains its hit points. The target is limited in the actions it can perform by the nature of its wolf form, and it can't speak, cast spells, or take any other action that requires hands or speech. The target's gear melds into the new form, and it can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment.

monsters.name: Couatl

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Shielded Mind
traits.desc: The couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is unconscious. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).
In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

spells: The couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

spells.At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, detect thoughts

spells.Daily (3e): bless, create food and water, cure wounds, lesser restoration, protection from poison, sanctuary, shield

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the cow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 bludgeoning damage.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning or slashing damage (claw's choice).

traits.desc: The crow can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

monsters.name: Crystal Battleaxe

monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.desc: The battleaxe is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the battleaxe must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the battleaxe remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal battleaxe.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

Each creature in that area must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 5 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The golem magically sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. This light goes out when the golem is destroyed.

traits.name: Light Intensity
traits.desc:
Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the illuminated golem and can see the golem must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded until the start of the creature's next turn.
A creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the golem until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the golem in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Crystal Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attack):

spells.Daily (1e): dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

monsters.name: Cult Fanatic

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith

monsters.name: Cultist
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.desc: The cultist has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
traits.desc: The cyclops has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two greatclub attacks.
