actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +0 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The leopard has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the leopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the leopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Snowy Owlbear
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The snowy owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The snowy owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Solar

traits.name: Angelic Weapons
traits.desc: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 6d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Divine Awareness
traits.desc: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The solar makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8) slashing damage plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Slaying Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage. If the target is a creature that has 100 hit points or fewer, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or die.

actions.name: Flying Sword
actions.desc: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 feet and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.

actions.name: Healing Touch (4/Day)
actions.desc: The solar touches another creature. The target magically regains 40 ({@dice 8d8 + 4}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport
legendary_actions.desc: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.

spells: The solar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 25}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect evil and good, invisibility (self only)

spells.Daily (3e): blade barrier, dispel evil and good, resurrection

monsters.name: Space Hamster
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: the hamster has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Rays
actions.desc:
The spectator shoots up to two of the following magical eye rays at one or two creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. It can use each ray only once on a turn.
[object Object]

actions.name: Create Food and Water
actions.desc: The spectator magically creates enough food and water to sustain itself for 24 hours.

reactions.name: Spell Reflection
reactions.desc: If the spectator makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the spectator can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the spectator. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

monsters.name: Specter
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

monsters.name: Spellcaster
monsters.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

traits.name: Magical Role
traits.desc: Choose a role for the spellcaster: healer or mage. Your choice determines which Spellcasting trait to use below.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame

monsters.name: Spellcaster (Healer)
monsters.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.desc: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, light, resistance, sacred flame

spells.1st level (4 slots): bless, cure wounds, shield of faith

monsters.name: Spellcaster (Mage)
monsters.languages: Common, plus one of your choice

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.desc: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The spellcaster's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The spellcaster has following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, minor illusion

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands, shield, sleep

monsters.name: Sperm Whale
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 90 minutes.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (6d6 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.desc: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 9 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Limited Spines
traits.desc: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (2d4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fork
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

monsters.name: Spirit Naga

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): charm person, detect magic, sleep

monsters.name: Spitting Mimic
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape 16). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.desc: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mimic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudopods and once with its bite.

actions.name: Pseudopods
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (9d6 + 1) acid damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Defensive Advantage
traits.desc: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not incapacitated, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.desc: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Touch of Madness
traits.desc: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
actions.desc: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Absorb Attack
reactions.desc: When a creature Splugoth can see hits him with a melee weapon attack, the weapon snags on a pocket of residual resurrectional energy and is caught fast. The attack is negated and the weapon cannot be used until the creature succeeds on a 12 Strength (Athletics) check as an action to pull it out of Splugoth. Natural weapons can have their attacks negated by this feature, but can then be retracted automatically at the end of the attacking creature's turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit, range 40/160 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. If its saving throw result is 5 or lower, the poisoned target falls unconscious for the same duration, or until it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

actions.name: Heart Sight
actions.desc: The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state. If the target fails a 10 Charisma saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spy makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

actions.name: Headbutt
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Statue of Vergadain
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Magic Theft
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the golem targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw, or all magic items in its possession are teleported to the bottom of the pit in {@adventure area 31|WDMM|15|31. Hall of Embers}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The statue makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The statue targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Steam Mephit

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.desc: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 feet of the mephit must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath {@recharge}
actions.desc: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The mephit can innately cast {@spell blur}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.desc: The defender can't be surprised.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.desc: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore {@dice 2d8 + PB} hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.desc: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

actions.name: Blood Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the stirge attaches to the target. While attached, the stirge doesn't attack. Instead, at the start of each of the stirge's turns, the target loses 5 ({@dice 1d4 + 3}) hit points due to blood loss.
The stirge can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. It does so after it drains 10 hit points of blood from the target or the target dies. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach the stirge.

monsters.name: Stone Dragon Statue
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The statue has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The statue's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Steam Breath
actions.desc: The statue exhales steam in a line that is 30 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d4 + 2) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.desc: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Rock Catching
reactions.desc: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful 10 Dexterity saving throw, catch the missile and take no bludgeoning damage from it.

monsters.name: Stone Golem
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Stonecloak
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, psychic,  from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Common, Draconic, Dwarvish, Elvish, Infernal, and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The stonecloak is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The stonecloak has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The stonecloak's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stonecloak makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Slow {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The stonecloak targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Storm Giant

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +14 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect magic, feather fall, levitate, light

spells.Daily (3e): control weather, water breathing

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two attacks with its greatsword or hurls two rocks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (6d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. 35 (4d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The fiend can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Without wings, the fiend loses its flying speed. Other than its size and speed, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Claw (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands. If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.
The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.

actions.name: Draining Kiss
actions.desc: The fiend kisses a creature charmed by it or a willing creature. The target must make a 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 32 (5d10 + 5) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.desc: The fiend magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa.

monsters.name: Swarm of Animated Books
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: False Objects
traits.desc: If the swarm is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the swarm move or act, that creature must succeed on a 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the swarm is animate.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a 1-foot-tall, 8-inch-wide, 2-inch-thick object. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Book Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Swarm of Bats
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Echolocation
traits.desc: The swarm can't use its blindsight while deafened.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny bat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

monsters.name: Swarm of Beetles
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Swarm

monsters.name: Swarm of Wasps

traits.name: Swarm
traits.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage, or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The basilisk can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Petrifying Secretions
traits.desc: A creature must make a 13 Constitution saving throw if it hits the basilisk with a weapon attack while within 5 feet of it or if it starts its turn grappled by the basilisk. Unless the save succeeds, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrified.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The basilisk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 12).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Reflective Carapace
traits.desc: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 20). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Horns
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 24 (4d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 20 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.
If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary_actions.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

monsters.name: Telepathic Pentacle
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.desc: The Telepathic Pentacle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.desc:
The Telepathic Pentacle has five heads. While it has more than one head, the Telepathic Pentacle has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.
Whenever the Telepathic Pentacle takes 25 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the Telepathic Pentacle dies.
At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The Telepathic Pentacle regains 10 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

traits.name: Reactive Heads
traits.desc: For each head the Telepathic Pentacle has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Wakeful
traits.desc: While the Telepathic Pentacle sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Telepathic Pentacle makes as many bite attacks as it has heads.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Thayan Apprentice
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.desc: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The apprentice is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): burning hands, detect magic, mage armor, shield

monsters.name: Thayan Warrior
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.desc: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Adhesive Blossoms
traits.desc:
The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.
At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything grappled by it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

actions.name: Thorns
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Chameleon Carapace
traits.desc: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thri-kreen makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The poisoned target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Thug
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thug makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Tiny Servant
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Tomb Tapper
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.languages: understands Common and Undercommon but doesn't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

traits.name: Petrified Death
traits.desc: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

traits.name: Sense Magic
traits.desc: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sledgehammer
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +10 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.

monsters.name: Topaz Dragon Wyrmling

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe both air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Desiccating Breath {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The dragon exhales yellowish necrotic energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is weakened until the end of its next turn. A weakened creature has disadvantage on Strength-based ability checks and Strength saving throws, and the creature's weapon attacks that rely on Strength deal half damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't weakened.

spells: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}):

monsters.name: Topaz Greatwyrm
monsters.speed: 60 ft., burrow 60 ft., fly 120 ft., swim 60 ft.

traits.name: Gem Awakening (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm would be reduced to 0 hit points, its current hit point total instead resets to 400 hit points, it recharges its Breath Weapon, and it regains any expended uses of Legendary Resistance. Additionally, the greatwyrm can now use its Mass Telekinesis action during the next hour. Award a party an additional 90,000 XP (180,000 XP total) for defeating the greatwyrm after its Gem Awakening activates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If the greatwyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.desc: The greatwyrm doesn't require food or drink.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 20 (2d10 + 9) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 19) and is restrained until this grapple ends. The greatwyrm can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: The greatwyrm exhales crushing force in a 300-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 71 (11d12) force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. On a success or failure, the creature's speed becomes 0 until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Mass Telekinesis (Gem Awakening Only; Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc:
The greatwyrm targets any number of creatures and objects it can see within 120 feet of it. No one target can weigh more than 4,000 pounds, and objects can't be targeted if they're being worn or carried. Each targeted creature must succeed on a 26 Strength saving throw or be restrained in the greatwyrm's telekinetic grip. At the end of a creature's turn, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
At the end of the greatwyrm's turn, it can move each creature or object it has in its telekinetic grip up to 60 feet in any direction, but not beyond 120 feet of itself. In addition, it can choose any number of creatures restrained in this way and deal 45 (7d12) force damage to each of them.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm makes one Claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Beam (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The greatwyrm emits a beam of psychic energy in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a 26 Intelligence saving throw, taking 27 (5d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The greatwyrm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attack):

spells.Daily (1e): dispel magic, forcecage, plane shift, reverse gravity, time stop

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The treant makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +10 to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.desc: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a {@creature treant}, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option. An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Tribal Warrior Spore Servants
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the triceratops moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 24 (4d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.desc: The tridrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.desc: If the tridrone dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tridrone makes three fist attacks or three javelin attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.desc: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Stench
traits.desc: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead shrub.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tyrannosaurus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 33 (4d12 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the udaak moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away from the udaak and knocked prone.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The udaak deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The udaak makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 21 (2d12 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape 21). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the udaak can't bite another target.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.desc:
The udaak makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the udaak, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the udaak's turns.
If the udaak takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the udaak must succeed on a 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the udaak. If the udaak dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

monsters.name: Ultroloth

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The ultroloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The ultroloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ultroloth can use its Hypnotic Gaze and makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Hypnotic Gaze
actions.desc: The ultroloth's eyes sparkle with opalescent light as it targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the ultroloth, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed until the end of the ultroloth's next turn. The charmed target is stunned. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the ultroloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The ultroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spells: The ultroloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). The ultroloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, clairvoyance, darkness, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, invisibility (self only), suggestion

spells.Daily (3e): dimension door, fear, wall of fire

traits.name: Confusing Gaze
traits.desc:
When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a 15 Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is incapacitated.
On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.
Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.desc: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Undead Bulette
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.desc: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.desc: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

monsters.name: Undead Shambling Mound
monsters.source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Necrotic Absorption
traits.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

traits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
traits.desc: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.desc: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.desc: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

monsters.name: Unicorn

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)
actions.desc: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendary_actions.name: Hooves
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn magically regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

spells: The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace

spells.Daily (1e): calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

monsters.name: Vampire
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.desc:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.
While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc:
The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.
Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.

monsters.name: Vampire Spawn
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)

spells: The vampire is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The vampire has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, fog cloud, sleep

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, gust of wind, mirror image

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a {@creature vampire spawn} under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.
Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vampire magically calls {@dice 2d4} swarms of {@creature swarm of bats||bats} or {@creature swarm of rats||rats}, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, the vampire can call {@dice 3d6} {@creature wolf||wolves} instead. The called creatures arrive in {@dice 1d4} rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.

monsters.name: Verbeeg Longstrider
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
traits.desc: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (3d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

spells: The verbeeg's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.Daily (1e): animal messenger, fog cloud, freedom of movement, pass without trace, silence, water walk

monsters.name: Verbeeg Marauder
monsters.source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: {@atk mw,rw} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is grappled (escape 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Entangling Plants {@recharge 5}
actions.desc: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or become restrained. A creature can use its action to make a 12 Strength check, freeing it self or another entangled creature within reach on a success.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The fungus makes {@dice 1d4} Rotting Touch attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Vox Seeker
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Voice Lock
traits.desc: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
